name: Armed Strike
desc: A strike making use of a weapon.
effect: Attack using your Weapon.

name: Brawl
desc: Either a push, pull, or grapple; this Technique covers a wide variety of hand-to-hand maneuvers.
effect: Attack using this Technique's _Profile_. You may only choose to _Pull_, _Throw_, or _Grapple_ if you have an _Open Hand_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: On a roll of a 7+, you may inflict two of _Push_/_Prone_/_Throw_, or two of _Grapple_/_Pull_/_Prone_, using the values listed for your _Roll_.

name: Gather
desc: You take the time to reset your footing or change your armament, preparing for future assaults.
effect:
Choose one:
* Clear _Disarmed_. You may stop _Wielded_ Equipment of your choice but keep it _Equipped_, then _Wield_ any _Equipped_ Equipment, or _Wield_ or _Equip_ a single adjacent, un-_Equipped_ piece of Equipment.
* Clear _Staggered_. You may change your _Stance_, _Style_, or both.
boost: 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Resolve both Effects.
imbue: 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Martial Arts
desc: A strike making use of any unarmed weapon.
effect: Attack with an Unarmed Weapon with a _Speed_ less than or equal to the current _Phase_.
special: If the _Speed_ of this Technique would change from an _Enhancement_, instead change the _Speed_ of all Unarmed Weapons by the same amount. If it would change due to _Accelerate_, choose whether to increase the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ or the _Speed_ of _Unarmed_ Weapons.

name: Prepare
desc: You take evasive maneuvers, raise your guard, ready your mind, or look for an opening to help you win this battle.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_/_Focus_/_Reflex_/_Momentum_.
special: You may make the Movement of this _Technique_ None. Gain 1 additional Token of any type.
imbue: +1 AP: Gain 2 additional _Tokens_ of any types.

name: Run
desc: A simple dash, covering ground as quickly as possible.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Add _Safe_ 2.
imbue:
Choose one:
* Speed is instead 2, and Move is instead Dash.
* Speed is instead 4, and Move is instead Sprint.

name: Size Up
desc: You carefully observe a creature, attempting to gain an insight into them.
effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Knowledge_ 2, _Scout_  (2 _Focus_).

name: Use Environment
desc: Sometimes.
effect: Use the _Interact_ Action of an Obstacle in the Environment with a _Speed_ less than or equal to the _Speed_ of this _Technique_.
special: You may use this Technique multiple times in a _Round_, but may not target the same Obstacle.
imbue:
Choose one:
* 2 _Momentum_. This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_. Increase the cost of this _Imbue_ by 1 if using it on multiple instances of this Technique.
* +1 AP: Gain 2 _Fleeting_ Tokens that must be used to pay for the cost of an Interact or _Boost_ for an _Enhancement_ used on this Technique.

name: Blade Ward
desc: You tilt your blade defensively, providing yourself a dangerous guard.
effect: The next time you are _Attacked_, make an Attack Roll. Reduce the Damage of the triggering Attack by half the Damage you would deal with that _Attack Roll_ using the Blade Weapon used for this Technique. Resolve the remaining Damage against yourself and your Weapon.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You have Advantage on the Attack Roll.

name: Sword Dance
desc: You weave your blades to an fro, creating a deadly web of steel to distract a foe as you prepare to strike.
effect: Attack using your Weapon. You automatically roll a 5, but inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Focus_). In addition, for the rest of the _Round_, creatures of your choice treat spaces adjacent to you as _Rough_, and all _Opportune_ Reactions triggered by a creature that started its _Turn_ next to you have their _Cost_ reduced by 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Instead, inflict _Exposed_ 2 (2 _Focus_).

name: Sword Waltz
desc: You prepare yourself, .
effect: When you initially use this Technique, do nothing. At the end of the current _Phase_ resolve all Movement. Attack every creature that you move through or adjacent to using your Weapon's Profile.
special: If you do not use any _Techniques_ or _Reactions_ this _Phase_ before resolving this _Technique_, deal +1 Damage and add _Safe_ 1.
boost:
Choose any:
* 3 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Immediately resolve the Effect.

name: Vorpal Blade
desc: You go for a vicious strike, rending a foe and leaving a vicious wound.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile, making a note of your final Attack Roll after all modifiers. The foe must immediately _Negate_ with 2 _Reflex_. If they do not, at the end of the _Round_, resolve the Attack against the target using the same Roll, but add _Glancing_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Resolve the end of the _Round_ effect two more times. It instead costs 3 _Reflex_ to _Negate_.

name: Blasting Strike
desc: You explosively charge your weapon, letting out a mighty blast as you make contact.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. After resolving that, immediately attack in the Area, treating your initial Target as the origin and attacking directly away from yourself.

name: Counterthrust
desc: A quick blast of flames allows a sudden, unpredictable change in momentum.
trigger: A Phase begins or you are Pushed.
effect: Deal 2 Fire Damage and inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) to a creature you move past with this Reaction.

name: Detonation
desc: A focused explosion of flame and force, becoming near-impossible to evade.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: If there are no other creatures or Obstacles within Range 2 of the Target, add the _Sure Hit_ 2 or _Unblockable_ 2 Keyword.

name: Explosive Blast
desc: You fire a close-ranged explosion, buffeting nearby enemies.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: You may _Flying_ Move 1 directly away from the Area, or 3 if you Boost.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead Side Blast 2. Increase the _Push_ and Cost to Negate by 1.

name: Explosive Leap
desc: A quick detonation launches you into the air, providing enough propulsion for a sudden move.
effect: Deal 2 Damage and _Push_ 1 (1 _Reflex_ negates both) within the area either at the start or end of your Movement.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_. Instead, Move is Dash, Speed is 3, and Area is Burst 2.

name: Explosive Touch
desc: You reach  out an simply touch a target, letting loose a powerful, close-range explosion.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. If the Target is an Obstacle, you may forgo an Attack Roll and treat your attack as if you rolled a 7. Gain 1 _Momentum_ if you Destroy an Obstacle with this.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead, Target is a creature.

name: Fireball
desc: A solitary mote of flame flies forth, before erupting into a truly horrific blast of flames.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: You may choose to delay this Attack. Take the Action at the original Speed, and mark the Area as a _Hazard_. At any point this Round, you may pay 2 _Momentum_ as a Reaction to Attack, gaining a +1 bonus to Damage on a _Graze_,  _Hit_,  or Crit. You automatically Attack at the end of the round if you do not use this Reaction.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Create 3 _Blazing_ spaces within the area.

name: Flashbang
desc: An extremely focused, extremely bright detonation temporarily blinds a foe.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Instead target a _Blazing_ space within Range 8. Attack in a Burst 1 around the Target, then Destroy it.

name: Short Fuse
desc: You respond to an enemies' strike with an indiscriminate explosion, hopefully creating enough space for a opening.
trigger: You are hit by an Attack
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.

name: Smoke Bomb
desc: An explosion choked with ash and smoke detonates, leaving an area on the battlefield choked with smoke.
effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_. The Area becomes Veiled until the end of the Round.
special: You may target a _Blazing_ space within Range. The Area becomes Blast 1, centered on the Target. Destroy the _Blazing_ space.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead, the Area becomes Veiled until the end of the next Round.

name: Volatile Mote
desc: You focus your energy, creating an explosion on the brink of detonation as an impromptu trap.
effect: Create a Blast 1 Hazard within Range. When a creature moves into this Hazard you must use a Reaction to Attack in all Hazard spaces.
special: You may pay 1 _Momentum_ to not trigger the Hazard when a creature moves into it.
boost: 3 _Momentum_. Reduce the Range to 6, but create two additional Blast 1 Hazards.

name: Volume of Fire
desc: A rapid-fire burst of explosions that can punish those without defenses.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: On a _Crit_,  Boosting instead costs 0 _Momentum_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. If the Target does not take an Evade or Block Reaction you may immediately repeat this Action against the same Target.

name: Fan Flames
desc: A small fire flares to life, buffeting those nearby with intense heat.
effect: Immediately make two spaces adjacent to the Target _Blazing_. If there is a creature in one of these spaces, they must immediately spend 2 _Reflex_ to Move into a space without _Blazing_ or gain _Burn_ 2.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Inflit _Impair_ 1 (1 _Grit_) on all creatures adjacent to the Target.

name: Fire Shield
desc: You cloak yourself in flames, violently rebuking all melee attacks.
effect: While this Enchant is active you cannot gain _Burn_/_Frost_. Whenever a Melee Attack Grazes, Hits, or Crits you the attacker gains 1 _Burn_ (1 _Reflex_).
special: If you are hit with an Attack with the Water keyword, you must pay 1 _Momentum_ or lose this Enchant.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Inflict an additional _Burn_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) when you are Grazed, _Hit_,  or _Crit_ for the duration of this Enchant.

name: Fire Stepping
desc: You wreathe your feet in flames, leaving a wake of wild flames.
effect: Make up to three spaces you move through _Blazing_. Inflict _Burn_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on any creature you move past or through. While using this Movement, you are Immune to the effects of _Blazing_ spaces.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead, make every space you move through _Blazing_.

name: Fire Wall
desc: Small flames grow in intensity, becoming mighty infernos across the field.
effect: These _Blazing_ spaces may be used as Cover until the end of the Round. In addition, the effects of _Blazing_ are doubled for the target until the end of the Round.
special: Until the end of the round, any time an ally would move into a targeted _Blazing_ space you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to allow them to ignore all Damage and Burn caused by the space.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Change the Target to 'Any number of contiguous _Blazing_ spaces, at least one of which is within range.'

name: Flame Blade
desc: A blade of flame ignites in your hand, burning away all in your path.
effect: Equip the Flame Blade Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Flame Blades Equipped.
boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Flame Blade in each.

name: Flame Jet
desc: You let loose a mighty stream of fire, drawing upon nearby flames for additional power.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: When you make this Strike, you may _Destroy_ any number of adjacent _Blazing_ spaces. If you _Destroy_ at least 2, the area becomes Cone 3. For each additional 2 spaces Destroyed, increase the Cone by 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Create a number of _Blazing_ spaces within the area equal to the size of the Cone.

name: Flame Wave
desc: A wide wave of fire shoots forth, scorching those in its path.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. You may repeat this Attack against a single creature adjacent to the original Target.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. If this attack Crits, inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).

name: Flamethrower
desc: You create a steady stream of flames from hands or mouth, blanketing the field in flames.
effect: Create a special zone of _Blazing_ spaces within the area. This zone moves with you and, at the beginning of a Phase, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to change the direction of the zone. If a creature enters this zone or starts a Turn in it they gain _Burn_ 2, _Burn_ 1 (2 _Reflex_). This special zone goes away at the end of the Round.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead Cone 3.

name: Ignite
desc: A sudden strike of flames, often leaving a foe wreathed in flames.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Destroy a _Blazing_ space within Range 3 of the Target. If you do, on a _Graze_,  _Hit_,  or _Crit_ inflict an additional _Burn_ 2 and increase the Cost to Negate by 1.

name: Searing Strike
desc: A weapon is set ablaze or superheated, leaving a painful wound on a foe.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_/_Crit_,  inflict _Burn_ 1 and _Wounded_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).
boost: 1 _Momentum_. If the Target has any _Burn_ Tokens prior to this Attack, increase the Damage by 2 on a _Graze_,  _Hit_,  or Crit.

name: Set Blaze
desc: A blaze is set, starting what can grow into a deadly inferno.
effect: The area immediately becomes _Blazing_. Any creature in the area gains _Burn_ 1x2 (2 _Reflex_).
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Area becomes a Blast 1.

name: Torch
desc: Overwhelming waves of fire strike a foe, burning through any defenses.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Add _Pierce_ 3.

name: Avalanche
desc: The Earthbound seizes control of all nearby boulders, shattering them to cause an avalanche of damage.
effect: Move all Targets 1 space in the same direction. Attack in a _Cone_ 2 originating from the Target, then _Destroy_ it.
special: If any Targets of the Attack are at a lower Elevation than the Target, they take 1 additional _Damage_.
boost:
Choose any number:
* 1 _Focus_/_Grit_ You may instead move all Targets up to 3 spaces.
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: You may target an additional _Boulder_. You may repeat this _Boost_, increasing its Cost by 1 each time.
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Replace one Target with a _Large Boulder_. Attack in a _Cone_ 3 from this Target. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Avalanche Charge
desc: You charge forward, creating a wave of earth behind you as you go.
effect: Twice during your Movement, you may deal 14 _Crush_ Damage to an adjacent _Obstacle_. Each time you Destroy an _Obstacle_ this _Turn_, gain Charges equal to its Size.
special:
At the end of this _Movement_ create the following effects, depending on how many Charges you have:
* Deal 1 Damage per Charge in a _Cone_ 2, up to a maximum of 5. Creatures may Negate with 1 _Reflex_ to take no Damage.
* If you have at least 3 Charges, increase the cost to Negate by 1. Inflict _Dazed_ 1 as well.
* If you have at least 5 Charges, increase the cost to Negate by 1. Instead inflict _Dazed_ 2. Make the Area _Rough_, or create a _Boulder_ adjacent to you.
* If you have at least 7 Charges, instead Area is instead _Cone_ 3.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_, paid when you would damage an Obstacle: Instead, deal 20 Damage. You may repeat this _Boost_.
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: You may deal Damage to an additional 2 Obstacles during your Movement. You may repeat this _Boost_.
imbue: +1 AP: Start this Technique with 3 Charges, and gain 2 Charges per Obstacle you Destroy. You may deal up to 8 Damage.

name: Stone Shield
desc: A slab of stone becomes a barrier, defending against ranged attacks.
target: Unoccupied adjacent spaces made of earth or stone within Range, or two adjacent Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacles.
effect: Create two _Boulders_ in the Target spaces. At the start of each of your Turns, you may move these _Boulder_s up to 3 spaces, but they must remain adjacent. They can move through occupied spaces, but may not end their movement there. If you pay 1 _Focus_/_Grit_, you may instead Move them 5 spaces and inflict _Dazed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on all creatures they move through. If both _Boulder_s are Destroyed, end this _Enchant_.
special: At the end of the Round, you may pay 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_ to end this Enchant and immediately fire the _Boulder_s forward. Make an Attack with an Improvised Heavy Weapon against all creates in a _Wide Line_ 6, 1 Area that must be touching both _Boulders_, then place them at the end of this Area. If only one _Boulder_ still exists, instead attack in a single _Line_ 6.
reaction_condition: While this Enchant persists, you gain this Technique's Reaction.

name: Stone Strike
desc: You fling a fist-sized stone at great speed, knocking enemies off-balance.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Add _Glancing_, but you may repeat the Effect.

Choose any:
* 0 _Focus_: Instead of immediately Attacking, create a Size 1 _Hazard_ within Range (or two if you used the previous _Boost_). At the end of the next _Phase_, remove the _Hazard_, then resolve this Attack against all creatures in the Area at _Advantage_, adding the _Arcing_ Keyword. Deal an additional 2 Damage on a _Graze_+, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Stonesmith
desc: You pull stone around yourself or an ally, providing a powerful barrier against harm.
target: A creature (including yourself), unoccupied _Earthen_ space, or an _Earthen_ Obstacle within Range.
effect:
Gain 1 _Grit_, then choose one, depending on the Target:
* Creature: Grant  1 _Grit_ and 1 _Stone Armor_. You may remove _Burn_, _Frost_ or _Shock_ 1 from the Target.
* Unoccupied Space: Create a _Boulder_ in the target space.
* Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle: Replace the _Earthen_ Obstacle with a Boulder.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Focus_/_Grit_: Resolve the _Effect_ twice, paying all _Boosts_ each time.

Choose one, depending on the Target. All cost 2 _Grit_:
* Creature: Grant 1 additional _Stone Armor_.
* Unoccupied Space: Create a _Large Boulder_ in the target unoccupied spaces.
* Size 2 _Earthen_ Obstacle: Replace the _Earthen_ Obstacle with a _Large Boulder_, or three _Boulders_.

name: Improvised Strike
desc: Any item can be a weapon, a simple fact you make use of for this strike.
effect: Immediately make an Attack using the Profile of an adjacent or Equipped Improvised Weapon. You may always make this attack using a Small Improvised Weapon by making use of rocks, sticks, and other small items that aren't shown on the map. Gain 1 _Momentum_ on a _Hit_ or Crit.
special: You do not have _Disadvantage_ when making _Thrown_ attacks with Improvised Weapons.

name: Crossing Field
desc: You sense a creature entering your field and rapidly close the distance, lashing out with a vicious attack.
cost: 1 _Reflex_, 1 _Momentum_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 2 or slower.
trigger: An enemy enters your Air Field.
effect: Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_.
special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_/_Strike_ you choose becomes None, but you may use the Movement of this Technique. Any Movement taken must be towards the enemy.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.

name: Curving Shot
desc: You guide your shot into a good wind, redirecting it into another foe.
trigger: You _Miss_ with a Ranged Attack using a Weapon.
effect: Immediately repeat the Attack against a different Target within Range 4 of the original Target.
boost:
1 _Momentum_. The Attack has Advantage. This Boost has no _Cost_ if the secondary Target is within your Air Field.
1 _Momentum_: Instead, the Trigger is 'An ally misses a Ranged Attack against a creature within your Air Field.'

name: Fieldsight
desc: You focus all your senses on your air field, expanding it but dulling your senses outside the field considerably.
effect: While this _Enchant_ persists, increase the size of your Air Field by 2. No Attacks that pass through your Air Field may have Advantage against you. However, you treat all spaces not within your Air Field as _Veiled_.

name: Flowing Dance
desc: You effortlessly move as soon as you sense an attack, spinning away flawlessly.
trigger: You are Attacked by a non-adjacent creature in your Air Field.
effect: Force the attacker to reroll the attack. They must use the new result. Inflict _Reveal_ (1 _Focus_) on the attacker, then _Safe_ Step.

name: Fluid Dodge
desc: You follow the path of least resistance, slipping away from a strike you sense coming far before it lands.
trigger: You are Attacked by a non-adjacent creature.
effect: Force the attacker to reroll the attack at _Disadvantage_. They must use the lower of the two results. You may _Safe_ _Step_ Move after this Reaction.
special: If the Attacker is in your Air Field, inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Gathering Dance
desc: You skirt past foes without a care in the world, sensing their air as you glide past.
effect: You may use as many _Evade_ Reactions as you wish this _Turn_ and reduce the _Cost_ of all of them by 1. Anytime you Move past a foe, inflict _Reveal_ (1 _Focus_). If anybody attacks you and _Misses_, inflict _Impaired_ 1 as well and increase the _Cost_ to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Guiding Thread
desc: As an ally is moved you feel the movement of the air and guide them into a more fortuitous path.
trigger: You or an ally within Range is _Pushed_/_Pulled_.
effect: The Target may resolve the _Push_/_Pull_ as if it originated from a space adjacent to the source of the effect.
boost:
1 _Focus_: They may instead resolve it as if it originated from a space within Range 2 of the source of the effect.
X _Focus_: Instead, reduce the cost to _Negate_ the triggering Effect by the amount paid in this Boost. You may also trigger this against a _Slide_.

name: Hone Senses
desc: You focus all your senses on your air field, expanding it but dulling your senses outside the field considerably.
effect: Increase the size of your Air Field by 1 until the end of the Round. Gain 1 _Reflex_ and 1 _Focus_.
imbue: 2 _Focus_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Influence Flow
desc: You sense the air currents around you and subtly influence them.
effect: Inflict _Reveal_ (2 _Focus_) on a creature within Range. If they do not _Negate_ and after learning their next Technique, you may inflict either _Accelerate_/_Slowed_.
imbue: 2 _Focus_, 2 _Momentum_: Instead resolve this against all creatures of your choice within your Air Field.

name: Intercept
desc: You feel an attack incoming and, with perfect knowledge of its path, snatch it from the air.
trigger: A Ranged Attack is made against you.
effect: Make an Attack Roll. If it meets or exceeds the original Attack Roll, treat the original Attack Roll as a 5.
special: If the Attacker is in your Air Field, make the Attack Roll at _Advantage_.
boost:
1 _Reflex_: Instead, the Trigger is 'A Ranged Attack passes through an adjacent space.' Do not make the Attack Roll at _Advantage_.
2 _Reflex_: If you are wielding a Ranged or Thrown Weapon, the Trigger is instead 'A Ranged Attack passes through a space both within your Air Field and Weapon's Range.' Do not make the Attack Roll at _Advantage_.

name: Threading Strike
desc: Your strike follows the air currents, curving in unnatural ways to find its target.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. This Strike ignores _Cover_.
special: If the Target is in your Air Field, gain 1 _Momentum_ and this instead has _Sure Hit_ 2.

name: Wind Rider
desc: You move with a fluid grace, sensing the direction of the wind as you move through it.
effect: For the purposes of this Movement you may treat all _Windy_ spaces as whatever direction you wish.

name: Dual Strike
desc: A vicious attack, striking with two weapons in quick succession.
reqs: Separate Light or Versatile One-Handed Weapons Wielded in either hand.
effect: Immediately use the Quick Strike Action twice, using a different weapon for each Strike and declaring what weapon is being used before rolling the attack. The Damage from these Strikes is halved.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. After rolling your first Attack, you may change which weapon it is using, so long as the target is within Range of the new weapon.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_. You may use the faster of the two Wielded Weapons to determine Speed.

name: Second Blade
desc: No matter how a foe attempts to evade your strikes, you always have a second weapon to catch them.
reqs: Separate Light or Versatile One-Handed Weapons Wielded in either hand.
trigger: A creature uses an Evade Reaction against a Weapon Strike.
effect: Immediately use Quick Strike as a Reaction, using the Weapon not used for the triggering Strike.

name: Defensive Flourish
desc: You disengage your weapon with a defensive flourish, easily flowing back into a defensive stance.
reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
effect: If you _Graze_ with the Attached Strike, gain any two of _Grit_/_Reflex_. If you _Hit_,  instead any three. If you _Crit_,  instead any four.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Mobile Flourish
desc: You disengage your weapon with a darting flourish, disengaging and slipping away from foes.
reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
effect: If you _Hit_/_Crit_ with the Attached Strike, gain 1 _Reflex_.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Offensive Flourish
desc: You disengage your weapon with an offensive flourish, catching nearby foes off-guard.
reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
effect: Deal Damage to a creature within Range equal to half the damage you dealt with the Attached Strike. Gain 1 _Momentum_.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Example Technique
desc: A sample Technique to outline the different potential parameters.
area: Area of Effect of the Technique
move: The distance you may Move with this Technique.
cost: An upfront cost typically for more powerful Techniques that must be paid when the Technique is played.
reqs: Requirements for using this Technique, typically the equipment you have Wielded.
effect: The primary effect of the Technique.
special: The secondary effect of the Technique.
boost: An optional effect with an associated cost that can be paid when the Technique is used.
imbue: An upfront cost typically for more powerful Techniques that must be paid when the Technique is played.

name: Free Run
desc: You charge forward, using the terrain to accelerate yourself further.
effect: The first time you move adjacent to a Size 1 or larger _Obstacle_ or change _Elevation_, you may immediately take a _Step_ _Movement_, adding _Safe_ 1 for this special _Movement_. This _Movement_ must be in a straight line directly away from the _Obstacle_/_Elevation_ change.
special: When _Falling_, reduce the distance by 1 for this _Movement_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: You may trigger the Effect on another distinct _Obstacle_/_Elevation_ change. You may use this _Boost_ as many times as you wish, but increase the _Cost_ by 1 each time.
imbue:
Choose one:
* _Speed_ is instead 2, and Move is _Reposition_.
* _Speed_ is instead 3, and Move is _Dash_.
* _Speed_ is instead 5, and Move is _Sprint_.

name: Quick Step
desc: Unhindered by armor you move quickly, dashing in the blink of an eye.
effect: Gain 2 _Reflex_.
imbue:
Choose any:
* Speed is instead 2. Move is instead _Reposition_, _Reposition_.
* 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Vaulting Run
desc: You charge forward, darting and leaping as you go.
effect: You may _Jump_ once during your _Shift_. Increase your _Jump_ by 1 this _Turn_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: You may make another _Jump_ this _Turn_.
* 1 _Reflex_: Add _Safe_ 1.
imbue:
Choose one:
* _Speed_ is instead 3, and _Move_ is _Dash_.
* _Speed_ is instead 5, and _Move_ is _Sprint_.

name: Butcher
desc: You defeat a foe in a brutal fashion, striking fear into the heart of your foes.
trigger: You defeat a creature.
effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Fear_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on them.

name: Stay Down!
desc: You lash out at foe, attempting to force them to stay on the ground where they belong.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. If the Target isn't Prone, this Attack has Disadvantage. Otherwise, deal an additional 2 Damage and inflict either _Grief_ 1 (1 _Focus_) or _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Grit_).

name: Taunt
desc: You issue a challenge to a foe, forcing them to focus on you.
effect: Inflict _Rage_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on a creature within Range.
boost: 2 _Momentum: Instead, Range is Self and Area is Burst 2. Inflict the Effect on all creatures of your choice within Range.

name: Warcry
desc: You let out a triumphant shout as you defeat a foe, bolstering an ally's spirit.
trigger: You defeat a creature.
effect: Choose an ally within Range. They gain _Courage_ 2.

name: Ablative Antagonist
desc: You attempt to block an attack using a grappled creature, giving your foe a difficult choice.
trigger: You are Attacked with a Single-Target Attack while you are the _Top_ in a _Grapple_.
effect: The Attacker must choose: Either add _Glancing_ and resolve the Attack against both you and the _Bottom_ or reduce the Attack Roll by 3.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You choose which Effect to use instead of the Attacker.

name: Grappling Strike
desc: You follow up an unarmed strike with an attempted grab to restrain a foe.
cost: 1 _Momentum_/_Grit_ if not using an Unarmed Weapon.
effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. After resolving the Attack, use the Grab Maneuver. If you _Hit_ with the initial Attack, increase the cost to _Negate_ the Grab by 1. If you _Crit_,  instead increase it by 2.

name: Grappling Swing
desc: You slam a creature you have grappled into another, using them as a clumsy weapon.
reqs: Must be _Top_ in a _Grapple_ against a Size 1 or smaller creature.
effect: You may _Pull_ 3 (2 _Grit_) on the _Grappled_ creature. Attack using the Medium Improvised Weapon's _Profile_, resolving the Attack is if it originates from the _Grappled_ creature's space. Resolve the Attack against the _Grappled_ target as well.

name: Improved Grab
desc: A grab made with flawless technique to engage in a grapple.
effect: Attack using this Technique's Profile.

name: Interposing Body
desc: You reposition a grappled target, forcing them between a foe and yourself.
trigger: You start a _Phase_ as the _Top_ in a _Grapple_.
effect: Create an Arc adjacent to you, with a creature you have _Grappled_ and are the _Top_ in at the center. Any Attack that originates from or passes through these spaces takes a -1 penalty to the Attack Roll if Melee or treats you as if you have Cover if Ranged. On a _Miss_, the _Grappled_ creature takes 2 Damage. This effect persists until the end of the current _Phase_ or until you are no longer _Top_ in the _Grapple_.
boost: X _Grit_: You may _Pull_ the _Grappled_ creature X before resolving this effect. They may spend X+1 _Grit_ to _Negate_.

name: Lock
desc: You secure your grip on a grappled creature, limiting their ability to fight.
effect: Choose one of the _Bottoms_ Hands. Unless they spend 2 _Grit_ to _Negate_ this effect, they may not use that Hand for the remainder of the _Grapple_. Increase the _Cost_ of all _Reactions_ for that creature by 1 for the remainder of the _Grapple_.
special: After using this Action you must dedicate a Hand to maintaining the Lock. If you repeat the Action using a Hand already engaged in a Lock, Attack with this Technique's profile.

name: Restraining Pin
desc: You take a grapple to the ground, harshly limiting a foe's mobility.
effect: For as long as the creature remains _Grappled_, they are _Restrained_, and your cost to _Negate_ the creature escaping the _Grapple_ is reduced by 1. The target creature may spend 2 _Grit_ to _Negate_ this effect, but they remain _Grappled_. While this effect persists you are _Stuck_. You may end this effect at the end of any of your _Turns_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: While the creature is under this effect, you may maintain the _Grapple_ without using any Hands.

name: Suplex
desc: You viciously flip a grappled creature for a devastating blow.
effect: Immediately _Move_ the _Bottom_ in the _Grapple_ to the opposite side of yourself and Attack them with this Technique's _Profile_. The _Bottom_ may spend 3 _Grit_ before you make the attack; if they do, do not Move them and add _Glancing_.
special: You  may choose to end the _Grapple_ as a part of this Attack. If you do, increase the cost to _Negate_ the Attack by 1 and increase the Damage by 2.

name: Throw
desc: You attempt to fling a creature away, creating as much space as possible.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. Only deal Damage if you _Push_ the creature into an Obstacle or Creature. The Creature or Obstacle they collide with the same Damage and inflict _Dazed_ 1 (1 _Focus_).
special: If you are the _Top_ in a _Grapple_ and target the _Grappled_ creature you may instead instead end the _Grapple_. You automatically roll a 12.
boost: 1 _Focus_: If you Target an adjacent allied creature you may automatically roll an 8 and only inflict _Push_.

name: Meteor Crash
desc: You gather the earth's strength in your legs before launching yourself through the air.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 2 this Turn. Separate from your _Move_ this _Turn_ you may make a single _Jump_. At the end of this _Jump_, make the Area _Veiled_, deal 2 _Crush_ Damage, and _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_) all creatures in it.
special: You may instead choose to not _Jump_ or use any _Movement_ this Turn. Instead increase your _Jump_ distance by 3 or double it, whichever is higher. Gain 1 _Grit_. Make a _Blast_ 1 _Hazard_ within your current _Jump_ distance. At the end of the next _Phase_, if you have not Moved, you may _Jump_ to the center of the _Hazard_, adding _Safe_ 2 to this Movement. Deal 4 _Crush_ Damage and inflict _Push_ 2 (2 _Grit_) on all creatures in the _Hazard_. Deal an additional 1 Damage and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1 if the creature is in the center of the _Hazard_. Remove the _Hazard_, then make those spaces _Veiled_ if you wish.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Increase your _Jump_ by an additional 1. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Stone's Resilience
desc: The ground around you cracks as you pull the strength of the earth inward.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_. You may not be moved against your will until the end of the next _Phase_ and have one additional _Guard_ for the same duration.
special: If you are in a Grounding Stance gain 1 additional _Grit_/_Momentum_.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Grit_: Make all adjacent spaces _Rough_.

name: Strength of the Earth
desc: An unchained strike, unleashing the might of an avalanche.
reqs: Melee Weapon Equipped or adjacent Improvised Weapon and Open Hand.
effect:
Make an Attack with your Weapon's Profile, or using an adjacent Improvised Weapon. Deal an additional 1 Damage (2 if _Heavy_), and choose one additional effect:
* For this Attack, increase your Weapon's _Thrown_ value by 4. If the Weapon did not originally have _Thrown_, use the _Light Improvised Weapon_ profile for a _Light_ Weapon, _Medium Improvised Weapon_ for a _Versatile_ Weapon, or _Large Improvised Weapon_ for a _Heavy_ Weapon.
* Make the target's space _Jagged_, add _Prone_/_Dazed_ 2, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Add _Siege_ and, as a part of this Attack, you may either Attack all Obstacles between you and the Target if Thrown or all Obstacles in your weapon's Reach if attacking in Melee. If you Destroy all Obstacles in the path ignore _Cover_ if Thrown or gain a +1 bonus to the Attack Roll if Melee.

name: Titan's Grasp
desc: Drawing upon the earth, you attack with colossal strength.
effect: Attack using any _Unarmed_ Weapon with a _Speed_ less than or equal to _Speed_ of this Technique - 1. Add _Throw_ 4/_Grappled_/_Prone_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. If you are the _Top_ in a _Grapple_ and target the _Grappled_ creature you may end the _Grapple_ to automatically roll a 10 and increase any _Throw_ by 2.
special: You may instead target an adjacent, willing creature. Do not Attack, and instead inflict _Throw_ 4. You may pay 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_ to increase this value by 2.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Add _Prone_/_Throw_ 2. You may repeat this Effect.
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: If you _Grapple_ with the first Strike you may use this _Boost_. Inflict _Throw_ 6 (3 _Grit_). If you _Push_ the target into an Obstacle, deal 4 _Crush_ Damage.

name: Worldbreaker Strike
desc: You gather your strength before unleashing an earth-splitting strike.
effect: Move before resolving the rest of this Effect. Create a _Cone_ 2/_Burst_ 1 _Hazard_ if Melee, _Blast_ 1 within _Reach_ if _Reach_, or _Line_ 6 if Thrown/Ranged. At the end of the next _Phase_, if you have not moved, remove the _Hazard_ then make a Weapon Strike against all creatures in the _Hazard_. Deal an additional 3 Damage (4 if _Heavy_), add _Prone_, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Focus_: Instead, create a _Hazard_ in a single space within your Weapon's Range. Resolve the Attack with _Advantage_.
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, create a _Cone_ 4 or _Burst_ 2 if Melee, or _Line_ 12 if Thrown/Ranged.
* 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, do not create a _Hazard_. Immediately resolve the Attack in that area.

Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_: Make two spaces _Jagged_/_Rough_ in the _Hazard_ when removed. You may use this _Boost_ multiple times.

name: Animate Vine
desc: You amplify the growth of a nearby plant, creating an aggressive vine capable of grappling foes.
effect: Destroy the Target, then create an Animated Vine with 10 Health in the same space. As a Reaction when a creature moves within Range 3 of your Animated Vine, you may pay 1 _Momentum_/_Focus_ to have it use the Grab Action as if it had Reach 2, targeting the triggering creature.
boost:
2 _Momentum_: Remove the Enchant Keyword.
	2 _Momentum_: Your vine is covered in aggressive thorns or resembles a carnivorous plant. Increase the Cost of your Reaction by 1, but deal 3 Damage on a _Graze_,  4 Damage on a _Hit_,  and 5 Damage on a Crit.

name: Bramble Wall
desc: Dangerous vines covered in thick thorns shoot up, .
effect: All Target spaces become _Bramble Wall_s.
special: If a creature is in a Target space, they must pay 1 _Reflex_ and Move 1 or take 2 Stab Damage and gain _Bleed_ 1. If they cannot Move out of a Target space, they cannot pay this cost.

name: Ensnare
desc: Vines erupt around a target, limiting their mobility and restraining them.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. If _Stuck_, the creature is _Stuck_ until they spend Grit equal to the Negate cost at the end of their turn. If _Restrained_, a creature is _Restrained_ until they Sacrifice an Action and spend Grit equal to the Negate cost, or deal 6 Damage in a single attack, targeting the vines ensnaring them. If this Crits, they must instead deal 10 Damage.
special: If the Target is in an _Overgrown_ space, increase the Cost to Negate by 1. If the space is also an Ensnaring Vine, this Attack has Advantage.

name: Ensnaring Vines
desc: You amplify the growth of a nearby plant, creating an aggressive vine capable of grappling foes.
effect: All _Overgrown_ spaces become Ensnaring Vines while this Enchant persists. Treat these spaces as _Overgrown_, but also inflict _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on any creature that starts or ends their Turn in an Ensnaring Vines space.
special: Whenever a creature enters an Ensnaring Vines space, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to inflict _Hobbled_ 1 and _Impaired_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).
boost:
X _Momentum_: For each Momentum spent, two Target spaces do not need to be _Overgrown_.
	2 _Momentum_: Remove the Enchant Keyword.

name: Flourishing Strike
desc: You lash out with your weapon, encouraging nearby plants to flourish and grow, granting you an edge.
effect:
Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Choose one of the following:
	• If there is an _Overgrown_ space adjacent to the Target, _Destroy_ it and gain a +1 bonus to your Attack Roll.
	• If there is a _Wood Source_ Embedded in the Target, _Destroy_ it to deal 2 _True Damage_ and inflict _Hobbled_ 1 and _Impair_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).
	• If there is an _Enchant_ with the _Wood_ Keyword within Range 5 of you, you may trigger its effect, reducing its Cost by 1.
	• Gain 1 _Focus_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_, 1 _Focus_: Choose two Effects.

name: Nature's Blessing
desc: You encourage growth in an area, creating fertile soil that plants readily grow in.
effect: Create a Nature's Blessing at the center of the Area with 10 Health and 1 _Guard_. If the Nature's Blessing is Destroyed, this _Enchant_ ends. While this Enchant Persists, Reduce the Cost of all _Wood_ Actions by 1 if they target something in this area. If the Nature's Blessing exists at the start of the Round, you may use the Overgrow, Bramble Wall, or Sprout Tree Action as a 0 AP, Speed 1 Action so long as it only targets spaces within the Area.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: If, at the end of the Round, at least half the spaces within the Area are _Overgrown_, Bramble Walls or _Tree_s you may Boost to increase the Area by 1 and increase the Nature's Blessing Health by 5 and _Guard_ by 1.

name: Nature's Veil
desc: Nature clings closely to you, obscuring your movements and providing an obscuring veil.
trigger: A Phase Begins.
effect: For the rest of the Phase you are considered _Veiled_ whenever you are on _Overgrown_ Terrain.
boost: 1 _Focus_: You may instead Target a creature within Range 4, granting them the Effect.

name: Overgrow
desc: Thick plants begin to grow, creating thick foliage that limits movement.
effect: The target Area becomes _Overgrown_. Gain 1 _Momentum_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Area is instead Blast 1.

name: Seeding Strike
desc: Your weapon flares to life, carrying the seeds for a host of plant life with it.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. _Embed_ a _Wood Source_ on 8+. If you do not _Embed_, create an _Overgrown_ space adjacent to the Target.

name: Sprout Tree
desc: Plants grow taller and stronger, becoming small trees at a rapid rate.
effect: If you Target an _Overgrown_ space, turn it into a Size 1 _Tree_. If you target a _Tree_, you may increase its Source value by 1. Gain 1 _Grit_.
special: If you Target a Size 1 _Tree_ who's Source value is 3, you may instead make it Size 2. If you Target a Size 2 Tree who's Source Value is 7, you may instead make it Size 3.
boost: 1 _Focus_: Instead of choosing three independent targets, you may instead target the same space multiple times.

name: Thorn Strike
desc: You unleash a close-range hail of thorns on foe, leaving painful barbs throughout their hide.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Choose an _Overgrown_/_Wood Source_ space within Range 8. Originate the attack from there rather than yourself.

name: Vine Whip
desc: You suddenly sprout a vine, lashing it out towards a foe and pulling them closer.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Choose an _Overgrown_ space within Range. Originate the attack from the _Overgrown_ space rather than yourself.

name: Cleaving Strike
desc: You swing your weapon in a mighty arc, potentially striking through multiple foes.
reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
effect: Attack with your Weapon's Profile in the Area.

name: Pommel Strike
desc: You quickly attack with the base of your weapon, knocking a foe off-balance.
reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_. Speed is instead Set-Up, and the Cost to Negate is increased by 1.

name: Power Through
desc: Attempting to block your weapon is one of the greatest acts of folly imaginable.
reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded.
trigger: A Size 1 creature uses a _Block_ Reaction against a Weapon Strike.
effect: The triggering creature must immediately pay 1 _Grit_ or be _Push_ed 2 and knocked _Prone_. They may pay 1 _Grit_ to Negate this, but you may immediately repeat this Reaction against them as long as you can pay the Cost.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Change the Trigger to say 'A Size 2 creature'.

name: Shieldbreaker
desc: You bring your weapon down in a vicious blow, tearing a foe's defenses asunder.
reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
effect: Attack with your Weapon's Profile. Add _Pierce_ 2 to the Attack.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Also resolve this Attack against the Target's Armor or Shield using the original roll. This Boost has no Cost if the Target uses a Block Reaction.

name: Aspect of Terror
desc: You seize hold a target's fears, placing yourself as the chief among them.
effect: Choose a creature within range and inflict _Fear_ 1 (1 _Focus_). So long as this _Enchant_ persists any Movement towards you costs 1 _Focus_ per space for the Target. This _Enchant_ ends if the creature ends its turn with no _Fear_.

name: Avatar of Fear
desc: You imbue a creature with the embodiment of fear, giving foes pause against approaching them.
target: Self or an ally within Range.
effect: While this _Enchant_ persists the Target becomes the Avatar of Fear. Foes treat themselves as half as far from the Avatar for the purpose of triggering _Fear_. Foes with _Fear_ take a Penalty equal to half their topmost _Fear_ on all Attacks against the Avatar.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Whenever the Avatar Attacks, either you or the Avatar you may use this Boost. Gain a _Bonus_ to the _Attack_ equal to half the target's topmost _Fear_.

name: Coward's Aid
desc: You enhance an ally's sense of fear and self-preservation, allowing them to flee from approaching foes.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 1 on the Target. They may pay 1 _Reflex_ to immediately _Safe_ _Reposition_. They must end this Movement at least X spaces from all foes, where X is twice their _Fear_ value.
boost: 1 _Focus_: Instead, inflict _Fear_ 2. Target may instead _Dash_.

name: Cower!
desc: You amplify a foe's sense of fear, causing them to break ranks and flee.
effect: The Target must immediately Move as far away as possible from a creature of your choice within Range. Their Movement depends on their topmost _Fear_ Token; _Step_ for _Fear_ 1, _Reposition_ for _Fear_ 2, or _Dash_ for _Fear_ 3.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Clear the creature's topmost _Fear_ Token. Inflict _Impaired_ with the same value. The creature then falls _Prone_.

name: Desperation!
desc: You reach out to an injured ally's heart, encouraging them to struggle for their life.
trigger: You or an ally makes an Attack.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 2 on the Target. They may make the Attack at _Advantage_.
special: If the Triggering Target has less than a third of their Endurance reduce the Cost by 1.
boost: Any 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: The Attack deals additional damage equal to the Triggering Target's topmost _Fear_ Token.

name: Frightening Howl
desc: You unleash a terrifying howl, sending all that can hear you scrambling.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 1 (1 _Focus_) on all creatures in the Area. If creatures do not _Negate_, they  must immediately _Step_ Move directly away from you.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Fear_ 2 (2 _Focus_).

name: Horror Strike
desc: A strike that draws upon primal fears, leaving foes cowering.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_, inflict _Fear_ 1 (1 _Focus_). On a _Crit_, inflict _Fear_ 2 (2 _Focus_).

name: Incite Panic
desc: You channel the essence of fear into a foe, causing them to quake in their boots.
effect: Choose a creature within range. Inflict _Fear_ 2 or _Fear_ 1x2 (2 _Focus_).
boost: 1 _Momentum_: After inflicting _Fear_ you may redistribute the target's _Fear_ Tokens in whatever way you wish, so long as the total value remains the same. For example, three _Fear_ 1 Tokens may be made a single _Fear_ 3 Token.

name: Mind Killer
desc: Fear consumes a foe's mind, destroying their ego.
effect: Inflict _Slowed_ (3 _Focus_). If, on the creature's _Slowed_ Technique they do not clear a _Fear_ Token due to distance resolve that _Fear_ Token twice and inflict _True_ Damage equal to twice that Token's Value.

name: Scurry
desc: You heighten your sense of fear and flee from an approaching foe.
trigger: A foe ends their _Turn_ adjacent to you.
effect: Gain _Fear_ 1.
boost:
1 _Focus_/_Reflex_: Instead, Gain _Fear_ 2. Move is Dash.
2 _Focus_: Trigger is instead 'A foe ends their _Turn_ adjacent to an ally.' The ally instead may Move and gains the _Fear_.

name: Striking Shadows
desc: You spark fear in a creature's heart, causing them to strike out at shadows.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 1 (3 _Focus_). If the Target does not Negate, the creature immediately makes an Attack with a Weapon they have _Wielded_ of your choice against a creature of your choice within Weapon Range. If the Weapon Speed is slower than this Technique this Attack is made at _Disadvantage_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: The Target may _Step_ before making an attack.

name: Terrifying Butcher
desc: You make a spectacle of defeating a foe while exuding an aura of pure terror.
trigger: You defeat a creature.
effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Fear_ 3 (2 _Focus_) on them. If they do not _Negate_, they must immediately take a Step Movement directly away from you.
special: Gain the Butcher Technique.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: In addition, transfer all _Fear_ the defeated creature had to the Target. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 2.

name: Attract
desc: You reach out with magnetic force, drawing metal closer to you.
effect: If you are targeting an inanimate _Metal Source_, _Pull_ 4. Otherwise, Attack with this Technique's Profile. If this _Pull_ causes the Target to collide with an Obstacle they take 3 damage and are knocked _Prone_ (1 _Reflex_).
special: You may instead Target an Anchor of any Size. If you do, _Pull_ yourself 4 towards the Target.
boost: X _Momentum_. Increase all _Pull_ effects by 1 or increase the Size of the Target by 1 for each _Momentum_ spent. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you. In addition, you may _Pull_ X any unequipped _Metal Sources_ within Range.

name: Crush
desc: You compress metal around a creature, causing unavoidable damage.
target: A creature that is a _Metal Source_.
effect: Deal 3 damage to the Target. If the Target is a Metalbound, they may pay 2 _Grit_ or 2 _Focus_ to negate this attack.
special: For each _Metal Source_ on a Target beyond the first deal +1 damage.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Inflict _Hobbled_ 1x2 (2 _Grit_) on the Target.

name: Lay Anchor
desc: You plant metal firmly into the terrain, providing a useful anchor to push and pull from.
target: Size 1 or smaller _Metal Source_ within Range.
effect: Move the Metal Source to a free space or Obstacle within Range. You may treat this Metal Source as an _Anchor_. Gain 1 _Momentum_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Repeat the Effect with a new Metal Source or Target a Size 2 _Metal Source_.

name: Magnet Pull
desc: You bond yourself to a metal source, either tethering it close to you or keeping it forcefully away.
target: Creature with a _Metal Source_ or an _Anchor_.
effect: If the Target is a creature, choose one: Either all Movement towards you costs double and it costs 1 more to Negate all your _Push_ effects or all Movement away from you costs double and it costs 1 more to Negate all your _Pull_ effects. If the Target is an _Anchor_, you are instead Immune to all _Push_, _Pull_, and _Slide_ effects while within Range 3 of the _Anchor_. This _Enchant_ ends if the Target removes the _Metal Source_ or the _Anchor_ is destroyed.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. If there is an _Anchor_ within Range and you target a creature, instead create a bond between the _Anchor_ and the creature.

name: Magnetic Return
desc: A missed shot or throw is immediately pulled back for a surprise strike.
trigger: You _Miss_ with a Ranged Attack using metal.
effect: Immediately repeat the Attack against the Target. If the Attack still misses, the metal returns to you.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. The Attack has Advantage.

name: Magnetic Ward
desc: A metal weapon is pushed away at the last second, providing a remarkable defense.
trigger: You are Attacked with metal.
effect:
If you paid _Grit_ for the Cost: Add the _Block_ Keyword to this Reaction reduce the Attack Roll by 3.
If you paid _Reflex_ for the cost: Add the _Evade_ Keyword to this Action and reroll the Attack with Disadvantage, using the lower of the two Attack Rolls.
boost: 1 _Grit_ OR 1 _Reflex_ (whichever was not paid in the Cost): Use both Effects.

name: Repel
desc: You lash out with magnetic force, launching the _Metal Source_ backwards.
effect: If you are targeting an inanimate _Metal Source_, _Push_ 4. Otherwise, Attack with this Technique's Profile. If this _Push_ causes the Target to collide with an Obstacle they take 3 damage and are knocked _Prone_ (1 _Reflex_).
special: You may instead Target an Anchor of any Size. If you do, _Push_ yourself 4 from the Target.
boost: X _Momentum_. Increase all _Push_ effects by 1 or increase the Size of the Target by 1. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you. In addition, you may _Push_ X any unequipped _Metal Sources_ within Range.

name: Seize
desc: You hold a creature aloft with magnetic force, leaving them defenseless.
target: A Size 1 creature with a _Metal Source_.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: The duration of _Restrained_ depends on your Attack Roll. On a _Graze_,  the Target is _Restrained_ until the end of the current Phase. On a _Hit_ they are _Restrained_ until the end of the current Round. On a _Crit_,  they are _Restrained_ until the start of this Phase next Round.
boost: X _Momentum_. Increase The _Slide_ by 1 per _Momentum_ spent. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you.

name: Shackle
desc: You fire off metal towards a creature, seeking to restrain and wrap it around them.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. Place the _Metal Source_ adjacent to the Target unless you _Embed_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Choose a Metal Source within Range that is not Embedded. Originate the attack from the Metal Source rather than yourself.

name: Shardstrike
desc: Metal flies forth from you, striking with telekinetic precision.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. Place the _Metal Source_ adjacent to the Target, unless you _Embed_.
special: Increase the damage by 1 for each _Anchor_ within Range 3 of you.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Choose a Metal Source within Range that is not Embedded. Originate the attack from the Metal Source rather than yourself.

name: Storm of Steel
desc: You pull metal into a rapid orbit about yourself, creating a flurry of deadly metal.
target: Size 1 or smaller _Metal Source_ within Range.
effect: Destroy the Target. Create a Burst 1 around you that moves with you and persists until this Enchant ends. Any creature that enters this Area or starts a Turn there takes 3 damage. If they end their turn there they gain _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Grit_).
special: You may instead originate this Action from an _Anchor_ within Range 6, treating the _Anchor_ as the origin for the Storm of Steel. If you do, Boost costs 2 less and does not require any additional _Metal Source_. You are Immune to all effects of this Storm of Steel.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. If there is a second _Metal Source_ or a Size 2 _Metal Source_ within Range, Destroy it. Increase the Area to Burst 2.

name: Tear Away
desc: You tear away an enemy's defenses, either disarming them or removing a portion of their armor.
target: Metal weapon or armor on a creature.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. If you _Disarm_ you may place the weapon in an unoccupied square adjacent to yourself or immediately Equip it in an Open Hand. If you _Shred_, create a _Metal Source_ in an unoccupied adjacent square adjacent to you for each instance of _Shred_ inflicted.
special: The Status of this attack depends on if you target a weapon or armor. If you target a weapon, inflict _Impaired_ 1 on a _Graze_,  _Impair_ 2 on a _Hit_,  and _Disarm_ on a _Crit_. If you target armor, inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 on a _Graze_,  _Vulnerable_ 2 OR _Shred_ 1 on a _Hit_,  and _Vulnerable_ 3 AND _Shred_ 2 on a Crit.

name: Heavy Charge
desc: You charge forward, using your armor as a weapon to smash forward.
effect: Gain _Fortify_ 1 until the end of your _Turn_. Deal Damage equal to your _Armor's_ _Guard_ and inflict _Dazed_ 1 against all creatures you move through with your _Shift_ this _Turn_ (1 _Reflex_ negates).
boost: 1 _Grit_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ for a single creature you Move through by 2. You may repeat this _Boost_, targeting a different creature each time.
imbue:
Choose one:
* Speed is instead 2, and Move is _Reposition_.
* Speed is instead 3, and Move is _Dash_.
* Speed is instead 5, and Move is _Sprint_.

name: Heavy Shove
desc: A powerful attack that relies on your armor's weight and protection.
effect: Gain _Fortify_ 1 until the end of your _Turn_. Attack using this Technique's _Profile_. On a _Graze_+, if the foe does not _Negate_, deal Damage equal to your _Armor's_ _Guard_.

name: Steady
desc: You don't move quickly, but the protection offered by your armor more than compensates.
effect: Gain _Slowed_, 4 _Vigor_ and 1 _Grit_. Gain _Fortify_ 1 until the end of _Phase_ 2.
imbue: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Haft Strike
desc: You strike with the haft of your spear, making space between yourself and a foe.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_/_Focus_. Attack using this Technique's Profile.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Focus_: This Technique benefits from your Lance Weapon's _Reach_.
* 2 _Momentum_: This Attack becomes _Burst_ 1.

name: Impaling Strike
desc: You attempt to run a foe through, impaling them with your strike.
effect: Make an Attack with your Lance Weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_+, add _Embedded_ and increase the Cost to _Negate_ by 2. While _Embedded_ in this way, the Target gains _Wounded_ 1 (2 _Grit_) at the start of each of their _Turns_. If the Target moves out of your _Reach_ the _Embedded_ ends, but you may immediately make an _Armed Strike_ against the creature with a +2 Bonus to the Attack Roll. Add _Glancing_ if the Movement was involuntary.
special: While the creature is _Embedded_ you may not make attacks against any other creatures with your _Lance_ Weapon, but have _Advantage_ and add _Push_ 1 on all _Strikes_ using your Lance against the Target. This _Push_ does not end _Embed_ unless the creature ends the _Turn_ outside your _Reach_.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: If the creature is adjacent to an Obstacle and you inflict _Embed_, inflict _Restrained_ as well then _Disarm_ yourself. The creature is _Restrained_ as long as they are _Embedded_ or until the _Obstacle_ used for this is Destroyed.

name: Piercing Lunge
desc: You prepare a heavy strike before lashing at lightning speed.
effect: Create a Line X _Hazard_, where X is Lance Weapon's _Reach_+2. At the end of the next _Phase_, Attack at _Advantage_ using your weapon's Profile against all creatures within the Hazard.
special: If you are Moved, remove the _Hazard_ and gain 1 _Momentum_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Momentum_: Place two more Line X's adjacent to yourself and the original Line. Attack all creatures within as per the Effect, but add _Glancing_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, immediately Attack in a Line X with your Lance Weapon, where X is the Weapon's _Reach_+1.

name: Set Spear
desc: You prepare yourself for an attack, situating your lance in the ideal space for a strike.
effect: Gain 1 _Focus_. Increase your Lance Weapon's _Reach_ by 1 and gain the _Charge Killer_ _Reaction_ until the end of the _Round_, you make an Attack with your Lance Weapon, or Move.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead, increase your _Reach_ until you Move or the end of the _Round_.
* 1 _Momentum_: Make all spaces in a Side Burst X a Hazard, where X is your Lance Weapon's _Reach_. If your _Reach_ changes, adjust the size of this Side Burst. All Reactions using your Lance Weapon against a creature in these spaces cost 1 less. All Reactions using your Lance Weapon cost 1 more against creatures not in these _Hazard_ spaces. These _Hazards_ are removed if you move or are no longer Wielding your Lance.
reaction_condition: While benefitting from this _Technique_, gain the following _Reaction_:

name: Earth Shaper
desc: The Earthbonded molds the ground around them, creating obstacles or a path forward with ease.
effect:
Gain 1 _Grit_. Choose one of the following:
* Make four empty, contiguous _Earthen_ spaces _Rough_/_Jagged_.
* Remove _Rough_/_Jagged_ from four contiguous _Earthen_ spaces within range.
* Create _Stairs_ on sides of your choice of an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ within Range and gain 1 additional _Grit_.
* Create two _Earth Pillars_ in empty, contiguous _Earthen_ spaces.
* Create one _Earth Column_ in a empty _Earthen_ spaces.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Choose two effects. You may choose the same effect twice.
imbue:
+1 AP: Remove the requirement for empty spaces. You may resolve the following against the creature in that space:
* If you create _Jagged_ Terrain: The creature must pay 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_ or take 4 Pierce Damage and gain _Bleed_ 1.
* If you create _Rough_ Terrain, _Stairs_, or remove Terrain: The creature must pay 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_ or gain _Prone_.
* If you create _Earth Pillar_s or _Earth Column_s: The creature must pay 3 _Momentum_/_Reflex_ or gain _Leaping_ _Slide_ 2 and, if you wish, _Exposed_ 1 and take 2 Crush Damage.

name: Earthen Agility
desc: The Earthbonded slides the ground beneath their feet forward, potentially leaving a wake of destruction behind.
effect: Create an _Earth Platform_ in your space. You may then move it as well as yourself in a straight line your _Reposition_ distance. This does not count as forced movement and ignores _Earthen_ Terrain. When you move through a creature, you may inflict _Impaired_/_Exposed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_). If you end this movement next to a creature, inflict _Push_ 2, _Exposed_ 1 (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_).
special: If the _Earth Platform_ moves adjacent to a change of _Elevation_ made of _Earthen_ materials, you may move the _Earth Platform_ up by reducing its remaining _Movement_ by the vertical distance covered.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Make all spaces you move through _Rough_.
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, use your _Dash_ Distance to move the _Earth Platform_, or take a _Reposition_ Move after resolving the Effect.

name: Jaws of the Earth
desc: Jagged stones rise up around a foe, ensnaring them and limiting their mobility.
effect: Make three _Earthen_ spaces adjacent to the Target _Jagged_. The target gains _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).
boost:
Choose any number:
* 1 _Grit_: If you Imbued, you may target a Size 2 creature.
* 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: If you Imbued, replace _Hobbled_ with _Restrained_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. A creature is _Restrained_ in this way until one of the adjacent _Jagged_ spaces is removed, they spend 3 _Reflex_ at the start of their Turn, or they willingly suffer _Hobbled_ 1, _Bleed_ 3 at the end of their _Turn_.
imbue: +1 AP: Instead, the Target is a Size 1 creature. Make all _Earthen_ spaces adjacent to the Target _Jagged_, and Attack with this Technique's profile.

name: Quake
desc: A minor earthquake, firing earth upward and testing the footing of all involved.
effect: Attack all targets in the area with this Technique's Profile. Do not deal Damage.
boost:
Choose any number:
* 1 _Focus_: Instead, Range becomes 6 and _Burst_ becomes _Blast_. 
* 2 _Momentum_: Area becomes _Burst_ 2.
* 2 _Grit_: You may make the Area _Rough_.
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: After resolving this Attack, create a _Hazard_ in the area. At the end of the _Round_, resolve this Attack once again (maintaining all _Boosts_ except this) and remove the _Hazard_.
imbue: +1 AP: Deal Damage. Increase the cost to Negate by 1.

name: Sinkhole
desc: Liquified earth threatens to swallow the unaware whole.
effect: _Earthen_ spaces in the Target Area become _Rough_ and a _Hazard_. From now on, at the end of each _Phase_, inflict _Pull_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on all creatures within the _Hazard_, treating the center of the Area as the source of the _Pull_. If a creature is in the central space, instead inflict _Restrained_ (2 _Reflex_). This creature is _Restrained_ until they spend 2 Grit/Reflex and use two tiers of Movement to escape. If a creature is already _Restrained_, instead deal 2 _Crush_ Damage.
special: If you repeat this Action while the _Enchant_ is ongoing you may either end the _Enchant_ on the current Area, ending all effects except _Restrained_, or repeat the end of _Phase_ effect twice on your current Area.
boost:
Choose one:
* 2 _Momentum_: Area is instead a _Blast_ 2. If you use this _Boost_ when repeating the _Technique_, reduce the _Cost_ by 1 and instead increase the Area of your current effect.
* 4 _Momentum_: Area is instead _Blast_ 3. If you use this _Boost_ when repeating the _Technique_, reduce the _Cost_ by 1 and instead increase the Area of your current effect.
imbue: +1 AP: Area is _Blast_ 2. Attack all creatures in the Area with this Technique's Profile upon using the Technique. Treat the center of the _Area_ as the _Pull_ target.

name: Adaptive Strike
desc: You use a strike to set up a future blow, sacrificing immediate effect.
effect: Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon with a _Speed_ less than or equal to the current _Phase_. Inflict no _Status_, but gain _Tokens_ equal to what the _Negate_ cost would be. These _Tokens_ must be _Momentum_ or a _Defensive_ Token used in the _Negate_.
special: If the _Speed_ of this Technique would change from an _Enhancement_, instead change the _Speed_ of all Unarmed Weapons by the same amount. If it would change due to _Accelerate_, choose whether to increase the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ or the _Speed_ of _Unarmed_ Weapons.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Gain additional _Fleeting_ Tokens equal to the _Negate_ Cost, following the same rules as the Effect.

name: Enfeebling Strike
desc: You make a precise, focused strike that erode's a foe's offense.
effect: Attack with a _Light_/_Versatile_ _Unarmed_ Weapon with a _Speed_ less than or equal to the current _Phase_. Replace all _Status_ except _Vulnerable_ with _Drain_ X, where X is the _Negate_ Cost - 1. You may _Drain_ _Momentum_ or a _Defensive Token_ used to _Negate_.
special: If the _Speed_ of this Technique would change from an _Enhancement_, instead change the _Speed_ of all Unarmed Weapons by the same amount. If it would change due to _Accelerate_, choose whether to increase the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ or the _Speed_ of _Unarmed_ Weapons.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Increase the _Drain_ value by 1.
* 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Add _Staggered_. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, but do not increase the _Drain_.

name: Finishing Blow
desc: You target a vulnerable foe, launching a vicious attack.
effect: Attack with a _Versatile_/_Heavy_ _Unarmed_ Weapon with a _Speed_ less than or equal to the current _Phase_. On a _Graze_+, resolve the creature's top two _Vulnerable_ Tokens instead of simply the topmost one. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
special: If the _Speed_ of this Technique would change from an _Enhancement_, instead change the _Speed_ of all Unarmed Weapons by the same amount. If it would change due to _Accelerate_, choose whether to increase the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ or the _Speed_ of _Unarmed_ Weapons.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Resolve an additional _Vulnerable_ as a part of this Attack. You may use this _Boost_ multiple times.

name: Flowing Strikes
desc: You go in for a quick series of strikes, putting your foes more off-balance with each blow.
effect: Attack twice, using any _Light_/_Versatile_ _Unarmed_ Weapons with a _Speed_ less than or equal to the current _Phase_. After making both Attacks, you may _Condense_ any _Afflictions_ inflicted by your _Unarmed_ Weapons.
special: If the _Speed_ of this Technique would change from an _Enhancement_, instead change the _Speed_ of all Unarmed Weapons by the same amount. If it would change due to _Accelerate_, choose whether to increase the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ or the _Speed_ of _Unarmed_ Weapons.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Make an additional Attack. You may use this Boost multiple times, but increase its _Cost_ by 1 each time.
* 1 _Reflex_: Take a _Step_ Move. You may use this Boost multiple times, but increase its _Cost_ by 1 each time.

name: Overwhelming Strike
desc: You make a heavy strike in an attempt to knock a foe off-balance.
effect: Attack with a _Versatile_/_Heavy_ _Unarmed_ Weapon with a _Speed_ less than or equal to the current _Phase_. Increase the Value of all Afflictions inflicted by 1. If this would increase the Affliction Value over 3, instead deal +1 Damage or add _Push_ 1.
special: If the _Speed_ of this Technique would change from an _Enhancement_, instead change the _Speed_ of all Unarmed Weapons by the same amount. If it would change due to _Accelerate_, choose whether to increase the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ or the _Speed_ of _Unarmed_ Weapons.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: On a _Hit_+, add _Slowed_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Blasting Howl
desc: A howl that brings a sudden gale, flattening those around the user.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.

name: Crunch
desc: A powerful bite when you already have a foe grabbed, sure to break bones.
reqs: Must use a 'Bite' Weapon and be used against a foe you have _Grappled_.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Deal an additional 2 Damage, add _Pierce_ 1, and inflict _Wounded_ 1 on a _Hit_ or _Crit_.

name: Fanged Thrash
desc: You whip a foe you have grappled in your jaws back and forth, dealing heavy damage.
reqs: Must use a 'Bite' Weapon and be used against a foe you have _Grappled_.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile twice. Add _Wound_ 2, _Slowed_ (2 _Grit_) to each attack. After resolving these Attacks, you may end the _Grappled_ Condition to _Push_ 3, _Prone_, 2 _Crush_ Damage, (3 _Grit_) the Target.

name: Rend
desc: An attack taken against a vulnerable foe that you have clutched in your grasp.
reqs: Must be used against a foe you have _Grappled_.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Inflict _Bleed_ 1 (1 _Grit_).

name: Rushing Wind
desc: You run forward with the wind at your back, accelerating nearby allies.
effect: You may _Accelerate_ one creature you move past.
boost: X _Reflex_: The creature you _Accelerate_ gains X _Reflex_.

name: Nimble Feint
desc: You cunningly feign an attack to create an opening for yourself.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Single Target Strike.
effect: The Target of the Attached Strike must _Negate_ with 2 _Focus_, otherwise you gain _Advantage_ on the Attached Strike and deal an additional 2 Damage.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: After resolving the Attached Strike, inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Barrage
desc: You quickly unleashing a hail of missiles, blanketing an area.
effect: Make an Attack with your Weapon's Profile against creatures of your choice in a Cone 3. Reduce your _Artillery_ value by 1 for this _Technique_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, Area is Cone 6.
* 2 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_.
imbue:
Choose one:
* Speed is instead Weapon-1. Add _Quick_. _Versatile_ Weapons deal -2 Damage.

name: Focused Aim
desc: You take careful aim, lining up a deadly shot if the target does not take precautions.
effect: Gain _Slowed_. Pick a creature within Range and inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (2 _Focus_). If they do not _Negate_, your next Attack with a Projectile Weapon against that creature has _Advantage_ and gains _Sure Hit_ 2, so long as that Attack is in a different _Phase_, you do not _Shift_ before making it, and that creature is not _Prone_ or in _Cover_. On a _Crit_, gain 1 _Momentum_.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead of gaining a bonus on your next Projectile Weapon Strike, make a Weapon Strike with a Projectile Weapon at the end of the _Round_ against the designated creature, so long as you do not _Shift_ before making it and that creature is not _Prone_ or in _Cover_. The creature knows it is under this effect.

name: Overdraw
desc: You draw your bow back farther or spin your sling faster, preparing for a far more powerful strike.
effect: Do not resolve the remainder of this Effect until the end of the current _Phase_. Attack using your Weapon's Profile, dealing +2 Damage.
boost: 3 _Momentum_: Instead, resolve the Attack in a Line X, where X is your Weapon's Range.

name: Volley
desc: You fire a high, arcing shot, gaining range and avoiding cover at the expense of a swift strike.
effect: Create a Blast 1 Hazard or 3 Size 1 Hazards within Range. At the end of the next _Phase_ make an Attack against all creatures in the _Hazard_, then remove it.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead create 3 Blast 1 Hazards, but resolve this Technique at the end of the _Round_ instead.
* 2 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_.

name: Iron Wall
desc: Making use of a shield, you ready an unstoppable defense.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_. Draw an Arc. For the remainder of the _Round_, reduce the cost of all _Block_ Reactions that pass through or originate from those spaces by 1. If you move, move this Arc with you. Whenever you _Shift_, you may reposition this Arc.
boost: 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Raise Guard
desc: You raise your shield against a specific foe, limiting their ability to assault you.
effect: Choose a foe. For the remainder of the _Round_, reduce the cost of all _Block_ Reactions and increase your _Guard_ by 1 against all Attacks made by that foe. In addition, you may substitute _Grit_ for _Reflex_ when negating their Attacks if you take a _Block_ Reaction.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Shield Bash
desc: You slam your shield forward, drawing a foe's attention and limiting their ability to attack others.
effect: Attack with your Shield's Profile. Deal no Damage but increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1 and, until the end of the _Round_, any _Impaired_ the creature has does not apply when the creature attacks you but is treated as one higher (maximum of 4) when attacking other creatures.
boost: 1 _Grit_: After resolving this Attack, you may _Condense_ the creature's _Impaired_.
imbue: +1 AP: Deal Damage. On a _Graze_+, deal additional _Damage_ equal to the creature's topmost _Impaired_ Token.

name: Shield Charge
desc: You run forward with your shield held high, bashing through all in your path.
effect: You have _Cover_ and +1 _Guard_ this _Turn_. You may inflict _Pull_ 1, _Impaired_ 1 (2 _Focus_/_Grit_) on any creature that you Move through.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Decrease the Movement of this Technique by one level, but choose an adjacent ally (at any point in your _Shift_). They may pay 1 _Reflex_ to take the same Move, resolving it after your Movement completes. They have _Cover_ and +1 _Guard_ this _Turn_, but must end their _Shift_ as close to you as possible.
imbue:
Choose any:
* Speed is instead 3, and Move is Dash.
* +1 AP, 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead of inflicting status on creatures you Move through, instead make an _Armed Strike_ against them using your Shield. Add _Pull_ 1 on a _Graze_+.

name: Smash Back
desc: You smash a foe backwards as they strike, mitigating the damage of the blow.
trigger: An adjacent enemy makes an Attack.
effect: _Wager_ _Grit_ with the Attacker. If you win, reduce the Damage of the triggering Attack by your _Wager_. After resolving the Attack you may use the Shove Technique on the creature.
special: The Movement of Shove becomes None.

name: Adaptability
desc: You dash your combat style to become more balanced, seamlessly flowing from mobility to defense.
effect:
Gain any 2 _Grit_/_Reflex_. After, you may exchange as many _Grit_ Tokens for _Reflex_ or _Reflex_ Tokens for _Grit_ as you wish, then consult the following effects.
* If you end this Technique with more _Grit_ than _Reflex_ gain 1 additional _Grit_ and gain _Fortify_ 1 until the end of the _Round_.
* If you end this Technique with more _Reflex_ than _Grit_ gain 1 additional _Reflex_ and immediately take an additional _Step_.
* If you end this Technique with equal, non-zero amounts of _Grit_ and _Reflex_ gain 1 _Momentum_ and gain a +1 Bonus to your next Attack Roll.

name: Agile Charge
desc: You run forward, striking a perfect balance between mobility and defense.
effect: Gain 2 _Fleeting_ _Grit_/_Reflex_ and 1 _Momentum_.
special: If any creature makes an _Opportune_ _Punish_ Reaction against you, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a 2 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal. Add _Glancing_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Reflex_: Add _Safe_ 1. You may repeat this _Boost_.
* 1 _Reflex_: Take an additional _Step_ Move.
* 1 _Grit_: Gain 1 _Guard_ for this Movement. You may repeat this _Boost_.
* 1 _Grit_: Add _Charge_.
imbue:
Choose one:
* Speed is instead 2, and Move is Reposition.
* Speed is instead 3, and Move is Dash.
* Speed is instead 5, and Move is Sprint.

name: Defensive Posture
desc: You adjust your footing and put yourself in a deadly defensive posture, allowing you to easily retaliate.
effect: You may treat the _Speed_ of all _Techniques_ used as a part of a _Punish_ Reaction as 1 lower for the remainder of the _Round_.
special: For the remainder of the _Round_, when you use a _Punish_ Reaction, you may choose to add _Glancing_. Reduce the Cost of the _Reaction_ and any selected _Technique_ by 2.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Air Blast
desc: You unleash a sudden blast of air, knocking a foe back and off-balance.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: The Target may pay 1 _Momentum_ to, rather than rolling, treat the Attack Roll as a 10.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Repeat this Strike immediately after using it.

name: Air Cutter
desc: You create a blade of compressed wind in your hand, forging a razor-sharp, invisible blade.
effect: Equip the Air Cutter Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Air Cutter Wielded.
boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Air Cutter in each.

name: Air Slash
desc: You fling out a sharpened edge of wind, cutting just as true as any blade.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Add _Slowed_ (1 _Momentum_) to this Attack. Reduce this Cost by 1 if you Crit.

name: Biting Winds
desc: You amplify the wind, creating a steep punishment for a foe who attempts to move through it.
trigger: A creature moves against the direction of a _Windy_ space.
effect: The Triggering creature chooses: Either they suffer _Push_ 2 in the direction of the _Windy_ space OR you Attack them using this Technique's profile. The Target may pay 1 _Grit_ to reduce the effect to _Push_ 1 and impose Disadvantage on the attack or 2 _Grit_ to ignore this Reaction.
special: You may repeat this Reaction as many times as it is triggered by paying the Cost again.

name: Headwind
desc: You create a powerful gust of wind and maintain it, forcing foes to slowly advance.
cost: 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh every Round this Enchant persists.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. Immediately after, the Area becomes _Windy_, with the direction pointing directly away from you. While this Enchant is active the Area remains _Windy_ and moves with you. You may pay 1 _Momentum_ to change the direction at the start or end your turn.
