You may end this _Enchant_ as a Reaction to inflict _Slowed_ (2 _Grit_) on all foes in the area.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead a 3x6 Line and the Cost increases to 2.

name: Swift Breeze
desc: You bring a breeze in from an odd angle, creating a wave across the battlefield and maneuvering a creature.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. You may make any spaces a creature is _Slide_d through _Windy_ until the end of the Round.
special: The Target may pay 1 _Momentum_ to, rather than rolling, treat the Attack Roll as a 10.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Inflict either _Accelerate_/_Slowed_ (2 _Momentum_) on the Target.

name: Tailwind
desc: You dash forward at a rapid speed, granting a bit of the wind's speed to another.
effect: _Accelerate_ a creature within Range.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Create two _Windy_ spaces adjacent to you at the end of your Movement.
imbue: 1 _Focus_: Instead, Move is Dash, Speed is 2, and you may _Accelerate_ two creatures.

name: Updraft
desc: You provide an updraft for an ally, allowing them to quickly launch themselves into the air.
trigger: You or an allied creature enters a _Windy_ space.
effect: The target creature may immediately _Flying_ Move 2.
boost:
1 _Momentum_. _Accelerate_ the Target.
	1 _Reflex_. Trigger instead becomes 'You or an allied creature starts their turn.'

name: Vacuum Strike
desc: As you strike with your weapon you launch a focused blast of air, amplifying and extending the strike.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile, adding _Bleed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on a _Hit_ and _Bleed_ 2 (2 _Reflex_) on a Crit. After attacking, repeat this Attack with Disadvantage in a Line 4 behind the Target. This Line Attack deals Slash Damage.

name: Whirlwind
desc: You twist and turn the wind about yourself, creating a vortex of wind.
cost: 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh every Round this Enchant persists.
effect: Make the Area _Windy_, with the direction of all spaces pointing either directly towards the center of the area or directly away from the center. The center space is not windy.
special:
Depending on the direction of the _Windy_ spaces, you gain one of the two following Reactions while this Enchant persists:
Inward: If a Ranged Attack enters any of the Area, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to make it instead Target the creature in the center of the Area.
Outward: If a Ranged Attack would pass through the Area, you may pay 2 _Momentum_ to allow the attacker to instead have the attack originate from any _Windy_ space in the Area.
boost:
1 _Momentum_. You may take this Boost at the start of any Turn. Move the Area 2 in any direction.
	1 _Momentum_. Instead of a Blast 1, Area is instead Burst 1 and Range is Self. The Area moves with you and is always centered on you.

name: Whirlwind Charge
desc: You sprint forward with reckless blast of air, blazing a path forward.
effect: The Movement granted by this Action must be in a straight line. Make all spaces of your choice you pass through _Windy_ until the end of the Round.
boost:
1 _Momentum_. You do  not have to move in a straight line.
	1 _Momentum_. _Pull_ 2 (1 _Grit_) a creature you move through or adjacent to, treating the oring as wherever you end your movement.

name: Wind Staggereder
desc: You unleash a sudden gust, knocking a projectile out of the sky.
trigger: You or a creature within Range is Attacked with a Ranged Attack.
effect: Reroll the Attack and use the lower result.
special: Reduce the Cost by 1 if the creature being Attacked is in a _Windy_ space.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. _Accelerate_ your ally.

name: Absolute Defense
desc: You strengthen your armor in a flash, providing an unbreakable barrier.
reqs: Metal armor, weapon, or shield Wielded.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: The Attack Roll is a 5.

name: Create Armor
desc: You take control of a nearby source of metal, shaping and forging it into armor plating on the fly.
effect: Destroy the Target. Choose a friendly creature within Range or yourself. Increase their _Guard_ by 1 for the remainder of the combat.

name: Create Weapon
desc: You create a weapon from any nearby metal, forging it into something new.
target: A _Metal Source_ that is unequipped or equipped by a willing creature.
effect: Destroy the Target and gain 1 _Momentum_. Create any standard Melee Weapon made of Metal, then Move it up to 2 spaces. If you place it next to a creature with an Open Hand, they may immediately Equip it.
imbue: 0 _Momentum_: You may instead use this Action as if its speed was Set-Up. It must be Attached to a Strike with the Weapon Keyword. Resolve the Strike using the created Weapon from its final position. It then falls to the ground.

name: Forge
desc: You take control of a nearby weapon or armor, enhancing its capabilities greatly.
target: A metal Weapon or metal Armor.
effect: If you target a Weapon, the creature wielding it gains Advantage on their next Attack with it and gains 1 _Momentum_. If you target Armor, the creature wielding it gains 2 _Grit_ and increase their Armor by 1.
special: If the Weapon is _Damaged_, remove _Damaged_. If the _Armor_ has any _Shred_, remove 2.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Instead, Range is 4.

name: Perfect Armor
desc: You push your armor to its limits, creating armor that few weapons can pierce.
target: Metal Armor or Shield you have Wielded.
effect: If you target Armor, you may have up to 6 _Guard_ passively and increase your _Guard_ by 2 while this Enchant persists. If you target a Shield, gain an additional 1 _Guard_ whenever you use a _Block_ Reaction and reduce all Attack Rolls against you by 1 while this Enchant persists.

name: Portcullis
desc: You weave metal into a intricate gate, blocking movement but not necessarily attack.
effect: Destroy the _Metal Source_ and create a Portcullis in its place, or in any adjacent space if the _Metal Source_ is on your person. If you wish, the Portcullis can be an _Anchor_.
boost: X _Momentum_. Repeat the Effect X times.

name: Sap
desc: You drain the integrity of a nearby weapon or armor, leaving it brittle and weak.
effect: All metal of your choice within the Area treats it Durability as two lower.

name: Shattering Rebuke
desc: Your steel becomes true while your foes' becomes false, forcing them sacrifice their blade or the attack.
reqs: Metal Armor, Weapon, or Shield Wielded.
trigger: You are Attacked with a Melee or Thrown Metal Weapon.
effect: Choose: The attacker reduces their Attack Roll by 1 and their Weapon becomes _Damaged_ OR they reduce their Attack Roll by 4.
special: The Attacker may pay 1 _Focus_ to instead choose the Effect.

name: Shattering Strike
desc: You amplify your weapon before striking out against a foe's equipment, attempting to sunder arms and armor.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile.

name: Steelforged Strike
desc: You amplify all properties of your weapon, drawing upon the essence within for a devastating strike.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Increase the damage by 1 on a _Hit_/_Crit_ and the Cost to Negate any Status inflicted by the weapon by 1.

name: Steelsnake Strike
desc: You reshape your weapon on the fly, striking from an impossible angle.
trigger: You Attack with a Metal Weapon.
effect: You may trigger this Reaction after seeing your Attack Roll. Reroll the Attack, using the higher of the two results. After the attack is resolved, the weapon becomes _Damaged_. Weapons _Damaged_ in this way return to normal at the end of combat.
special: You may instead _Damage_ your Weapon to add _Sure Hit_ to the attack.

name: Tungsten Strike
desc: A taxing strike that thwarts all defenses with an indestructible weapon.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. If you roll less than a 7, treat the Attack Roll as a 7. On a _Hit_/_Crit_,  also resolve this Attack against the target's Armor, but inflict no additional Damage or Conditions.

name: Hearts of Stone
desc: You rouse the hearts of those near you, allowing them to push far beyond their mortal limits.
effect: Grant all allies in Range _Vigor_ 2. While this _Enchant_ persists, whenever an ally within Range would gain or try to clear _Impaired_/_Dazed_/_Hobbled_ they may clear any Value of _Courage_ and reduce the cost to Negate by the total Value cleared. Alternatively, if an ally would begin their turn _Winded_ they may clear 2 _Courage_ to act as if they were not _Winded_ for that Turn.

name: Hero's Duel
desc: You engage a foe in a heroic duel, compelling combat between the two of you.
effect:
The Target must Negate with 3 _Focus_. If they do not, grant them _Courage_ 2 and you and the Target become engaged in a Heroic Duel. While this _Enchant_ persists:
* Both parties in the Duel may not clear _Courage_. Instead, they gain the benefit of clearing their topmost _Courage_ whenever they end their turn adjacent to their Duel Partner.
* Both members of the Duel take a Penalty to all Attack Rolls equal to their topmost _Courage_ token, unless it targets only their Duel Partner.
* If a creature ends their Turn more than 2 spaces from their Duel Partner, they lose _Momentum_ or _Defensive Tokens_ equal to their topmost _Courage_ Token.
* Both creatures gain the _Heroic Exchange_ Reaction.

This Enchant ends when one member of the Duel is _Defeated_, one of your allies attacks your Duel Partner, or you end your Turn more than 4 spaces away from your Duel Partner. If you _Defeat_ your Duel Partner, gain _Courage_ 3.
reaction_condition: While this Enchant persists, you and your Duel Partner gain this Technique's Reaction.

name: Last Stand
desc: You fill a falling friend with courage, keeping them on their feet when they should fall.
target: Yourself or a creature within Range.
effect:
While this _Enchant_ persists, the creature gains benefits based on how much Endurance they have remaining. Effects are cumlative unless stated otherwise:
* 100%: Target gains _Courage_ 1 at the start of the _Round_.
* 75%: Target instead gains _Courage_ 2 at the start of the _Round_.
* 50%: Target gains a +1 Bonus to Attack Rolls while they have any _Courage_.
* 25%: Target gains 3 _Vigor_ at the start of each _Turn_.
* 0%: Target takes no penalties for being _Winded_.  At the start of each of their _Turns_, the Target either gains _Courage_ 1 or increases the value of their topmost _Courage_ Token by 1.

This _Enchant_ ends if the Target ever has no _Courage_.
reaction_condition: While this Enchant persists, the Target of this Technique gains the below Reaction:

name: Reckless Bravery
desc: You fill a creature with bravery, granting them either reckless power or a forcing a foolish opening.
effect:
Choose a creature within range and inflict one of the following:
* The creature gains _Courage_ 1, _Exposed_ 2 (2 _Focus_).
* The creature gains 2 Value of _Courage_, distributed as you wish. Once before the end of the Round, that creature may clear their topmost _Courage_ as a part of making an Attack and add the Token's Value as a Bonus to the Attack Roll.
boost:
1 _Focus_/_Momentum_ (if you picked the first option): Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. Unless the Target Negates, that creature must immediately _Reposition_, using all Movement to move directly towards an enemy by the shortest possible route.
* 1 _Focus_ (if you picked the second option): Increase the _Courage_ granted by 1. You may _Condense_ the Target's _Courage_ if you wish.

name: Valiant Charge
desc: You fill an ally with reckless bravery, allowing them to charge headlong into the fray.
effect: Choose a creature within range. That creature may immediately pay 1 _Reflex_ to Reposition as a Reaction, but must move directly towards an enemy by the shortest possible route. If they end this Movement adjacent to a hostile creature, grant them _Vigor_ 2. If they suffer any _Opportune_ _Punish_ Reactions, grant them _Courage_ 2.
boost:
Choose one:
* 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: You may target an additional creature.
* 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: If the target ends their Movement adjacent to an enemy, they may use the _Martial Arts_ Technique after resolving their _Movement_.
* 3 _Focus_/_Momentum_: As above, but they may use the _Armed Strike_ Technique.

Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_/_Focus_: All targets gains 2 _Guard_ while using the Movement granted by this.

name: Chain Lightning
desc: Your electricity strikes like a snake, leaping from one target to another in a vicious chain.
trigger: You inflict _Shock_, or have _Hit_/_Crit_ with an _Electric_ Attack you had Advantage on.
effect: After resolving the Triggering Attack, Attack with this Technique's Profile against a Secondary Target within Range 4 of the Triggering Target. Deal Damage equal to the topmost _Shock_ Token on the Triggering Target. If the Secondary Target Negates, they take half Damage.
special: You may repeat this Reaction as many times as it is triggered by paying the Cost again.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: The Trigger is instead: 'You are Attacked while having any _Shock_.'

name: Charge
desc: You pull in nearby electricity, building up an electrical charge within yourself.
effect: Gain _Shock_ 2 and 1 _Reflex_. Gain a +1 Attack Bonus on your next Storm Attack.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Instead, gain _Shock_ 3.

name: Discharge
desc: You let loose a barrage of energy at close range, amplifying it with any power stored within.
effect: Clear up to four value of _Shock_ Tokens, then Attack with this Technique's Profile. If you _Graze_,  add half the cleared _Shock_ value to the Damage. On a _Hit_/_Crit_, add all cleared _Shock_ value to the Damage.
special: You may clear additional _Shock_ Tokens as a part of this Attack, but take True Damage equal to its value for each additional _Shock_ Tokens cleared.
boost: 3 _Momentum_: Clear 2 more value of _Shock_, but don't add it to the Damage or take Damage from it. If you do, Area becomes Burst 2.

name: Electrocute
desc: You fire a stream of continuous electricty into a foe, limiting their mobility and electrifying them.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. While this Enchant persists, at the end of the Target's Turn you may repeat this Attack as a Reaction by paying 1 _Momentum_. This Enchant ends if you and the target are ever more than Range spaces apart.
boost:
0 _Momentum_: Gain _Shock_ 1. Increase the Damage by 1 while this Enchant persists.
	1 _Momentum_: Gain _Shock_ 2. Increase the Shock on a _Hit_/_Crit_ by 1 while this Enchant persists.

name: Gathering Storm
desc: A sudden storm appears overhead, crackling with electric energy that can strike the ground at any moment.
effect: Create 3 _Hazard_s within Range that are not adjacent to one another. If a creature enters one of these _Hazard_ spaces you may inflict _Shock_ 2 (2 _Reflex_) as a Reaction.
boost: 1 _Momentum_ (paid when a Hazard is triggered). Deal 2 plus the current Phase Lightning Damage to the triggering creature.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_. Speed is instead 1.

name: Gigavolt Blast
desc: The ground nearby crackles with electricty, before a collosal bolt strikes down with incredible force.
effect: Create a Blast 1 _Hazard_ within Range. At the end of Phase 4 Destroy the _Hazard_. When the _Hazard_ is Destroyed, resolve this Technique's Attack in the _Hazard_ spaces.
boost: X _Momentum_ (max of 2): For each Momentum paid, Destroy the _Hazard_ one Phase later. For each _Momentum_ spent, increase the Damage by 2 and add _Shock_ 1 on a _Hit_ or Crit.

name: Lightning Bolt
desc: You shoot a powerful bolt of electricty, punching through all obstacles in its path.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: X _Momentum_: For every _Momentum_ spent increase the Line by 2. Instead of paying _Momentum_ you may instead gain _Shock_ 1.

name: Lightning Chariot
desc: You channel the power of the storm, traveling across the battlefield like a bolt of lightning.
effect: Create a Blast 1 _Hazard_ within Range. If a creature enters the _Hazard_, immediately _Destroy_ the _Hazard_. Otherwise, _Destroy_ the _Hazard_ at the end of Phase 3. If you are within Range of the _Hazard_ when it is Destroyed, immediately _Teleport_ Move to any space in the _Hazard_ and inflict _Shock_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) an deal 3 Damage in the area.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead of Inflicting _Shock_ 1, deal 4 Lightning Damage and inflict _Shock_ 2 (2 _Reflex_). If a creature Negates they take half Damage.

name: Lightning Palm
desc: You conjure a shocking burst in your hand, unleashing it at point blank range for a powerful strike.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Exposed_ 1 to the Attack and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

name: Lightning Strike
desc: You channel electricity through your weapon, attacking with incredible, blinding speed.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile, adding _Shock_ 1 (1 _Grit_) on a _Hit_ and _Shock_ 2 (2 _Grit_) on a Crit.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add the _Teleport_ Keyword.

name: Overcharge
desc: You rely on electricity to provide your reaction speed, providing sudden evasion with a cost.
trigger: You are _Attacked_.
effect: Reroll the Attack and immediately _Safe_ Move 1. You must use the new result. After resolving the Attack, gain _Shock_ 1.

name: Shock Wave
desc: You amplify the electricity on a foe, removing their shock in a sudden burst.
effect:
Remove up to 3 value of _Shock_ from the foe. Deal Lightning Damage equal to the removed _Shock_, then purchase as many of the following Conditions as you wish:
1: The Target gains one of: _Hobbled_ 1, _Impair_ 1, _Exposed_ 1.
2: The Target gains one of: _Hobbled_ 2, _Impair_ 2, _Exposed_ 2.
3: The Target is _Restrained_ until the end of their next turn.
The Target may ignore the afflicted Condition by paying _Grit_ equal to the value removed.
special: The cost to Negate is increased by 1 if the Target is Soaked or in a Water Source.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: You may remove up to 6 value of _Shock_. If you pick the _Restrained_ option more than once, add additional turns to the Condition.

name: Distracting Lob
desc: You toss a weapon high in the air. While it has little force behind it, it does draw the eyes of all foes involved.
effect: Create a Size 1 _Hazard_ within Range as you throw an _Equipped_ _Thrown_ Weapon upward. Inflict _Exposed_ 1 (2 _Focus_) on all creatures in a _Burst_ 1 around the _Hazard_. At the end of the next Phase remove the _Hazard_ and use _Armed Strike_ on any creature in that space, adding _Arcing_ and using the _Thrown_ Weapon used for this _Technique_.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_ from the Attack.
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Exposed_ 2 (3 _Focus_) on a single creature within the _Hazard_.

name: Rapid Toss
desc: Your hands blur as you throw weapons, attacking with blinding speed.
effect: Attack using a _Thrown_ Weapon.
special: Versatile Weapons take a -1 damage penalty.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Repeat the Effect. The Target must be a creature adjacent to the original Target. Increase the Cost of this Boost by 1 each time it is used. An individual creature may only be attacked by this Technique once per Turn.

name: Ready Hand
desc: You ready yourself to fling out weapons, preparing yourself to fling them at a moment's notice.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. For the rest of the Round, you may _Trigger_ the _Opportunity Attack_ Reaction as if your _Reach_ is the Range of an _Equipped_ _Thrown_ Weapon. When used in this way, increase the _Cost_ by 1 and you must use the _Thrown_ Weapon who's Range triggered the _Reaction_.

name: Vicious Draw
desc: You pull an embedded throwing weapon from a foe before flinging it into another.
effect: Choose a creature in Range with a _Thrown_ Weapon _Embedded_. That creature must _Negate_ with 2 _Reflex_. If they do not, resolve an Attack as if you rolled a 7 with that Weapon. End the _Embed_ and either _Equip_ or _Wield_ (if you have an _Open Hand_) the Weapon.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Immediately use _Armed Strike_ using the Weapon used for the effect. Ignore all penalties due to adjacent foes.

name: Aqua Lash
desc: You reach out with a torrent of water, wrapping it around a foe before drawing them close.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: If there is a _Water Source_ within Range 6, you may originate this attack from there. For this use, treat the Range as Melee and Area as Line 6. If the _Water Source_ has at least two adjacent _Water Source_s, this Attack gains _Accurate_.

name: Aqua Ring
desc: You seize a nearby source of water, manipulating it into a ring around you to launch attacks from unpredictable angles.
effect: _Destroy_ all Targets. So long as this _Enchant_ persists you may treat any space within a Burst 2 of you as the origin of any Water Attacks, treating it as a _Water Source_ if you wish. You may end this Enchant at any time to gain _Grit_ equal to the number of _Water Source_s within your Aqua Ring.
special: Once per round on your turn you may pay 2 _Momentum_ to _Destroy_ an additional two _Water Source_s and increase the number of _Water Source_s your Aqua Ring counts as by 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Target is instead four _Water Source_s, and you may treat the ring as two _Water Source_s.

name: Aquatic Armor
desc: You create a thin coat of water around the target, providing a simple defense and quenching flames.
effect: The Target gains 2 _Grit_, 5 _Vigor_, and _Soaked_ 1x2.
boost: X _Momentum. For every 2 _Momentum_ spent you may _Destroy_ a _Water Source_ within Range 4 repeat this Action.

name: Call the Tides
desc: You become the center of the tides, pushing or pulling all water near you as you please.
target: All spaces with _Wet_ Terrain or _Water Sources_ within Range.
effect: You may either _Push_/_Pull_ all Targets. Repeat twice. Any creature in a Target space suffers the same _Push_/_Pull_. A creature may spend 1 _Reflex_ to negate this for the remainder of the Turn. If a creature would collide with an obstacle, they are knocked _Prone_.
special: A _Water Source_ that is moved out of its original space by this effect instead creates _Wet_ Terrain adjacent to the _Water Source_.

name: Crashing Wave
desc: You pull nearby water towards you, slowly creating a massive wave that comes crashing down with unstoppable force.
target: A total of at least 4 _Water Sources_ within range.
effect: _Destroy_ all Targets. Draw a 3 by X Line from you, where X is the total number of the Targets Destroyed and mark is as a _Hazard_. In 3 Phases, at the start of the Phase, Attack with this Technique's Profile in the Area, then _Destroy_ all Terrain in the Area and make it _Wet_.
boost: X _Momentum_. For every _Momentum_ spent, you may Target up to two additional 2 _Water Sources_.

name: Crushing Pressure
desc: Your waves holds your opponent against an obstacle for a moment longer, crushing them against the surface.
trigger: You _Push_/_Pull_ a creature into an Obstacle or a creature with a Water Action.
effect: Attack the triggering creature with this Technique's Profile. If this triggered off a _Push_/_Pull_ into another creature you may attack both creatures, but have Disadvantage on both attacks.

name: Hydroplane
desc: You run along water, treating it just as stable as the ground itself.
effect: This Movement may be used to move along _Water Source_s as if they were normal terrain.
special: All Movement from this ability on either a _Water Source_/_Wet_ Terrain is _Safe_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Up to three times, make a space you move through _Wet_.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_: You may treat all _Water Source_s as if they were normal terrain for this entire round and may safely end your turn on _Water Source_s.

name: Rushing River
desc: You propel yourself forward with a wave, before sending that wave crashing forth.
effect: _Destroy_ a _Water Source_ within Range 4. Attack with this Technique's Profile, then make the Area _Wet_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. After resolving the Attack you may _Safe_ Move to any point in or adjacent to the Area.

name: Surging Stream
desc: You let loose a jet of water, pummeling an enemy backwards.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
special: If there is a _Water Source_ within Range 6, you may originate this attack from there. For this use, treat the Range as Melee and Area as Line 6. If the _Water Source_ has at least two adjacent _Water Source_s, this Attack gains _Accurate_.

name: Water Sphere
desc: You pull a source of water free, creating a watery tomb to encase a foe in.
effect: _Destroy_ all Targets. Create a Size 1 Water Sphere within Range. Any creatures in this space must immediately spend 1 _Reflex_ to Move 1. Otherwise, that creature immediately becomes _Restrained_ within the Watery Sphere. While _Restrained_ in this way the creature takes 3 _True_ Damage at the end of each of their turns and gains _Soaked_ 2. A creature _Restrained_ by the Water Sphere can escape by Sacrificing an Action and expending 1 _Focus_/_Grit_. If a creature moves into a space with a Water Sphere while there is no creature currently _Restrained_ in this space, they immediately become _Restrained_.
special: When you end this Enchant the spaces containing a Water Sphere and all adjacent spaces become _Wet_.
boost: 2 or 4 _Momentum_: If you spend 2 _Momentum_, Target is instead 3 _Water Source_s and you create a Size 2 Water Sphere. If you spend 4 _Momentum_, Target is instead 8 _Water Source_s and you create a Size 3 Water Sphere.

name: Water Wall
desc: A wave surges up in front of you, providing powerful, if temporary, defense.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 1. If the Attack was Melee, you may _Push_ the Attacker 2 (1 _Grit_). If the Attack was Ranged, gain Cover against it.
special: If you are on or adjacent to _Wet_ Terrain reduce the Cost of this Reaction by 1.

name: Water Whip
desc: You form a malleable lash of water, maintaining its form to make a useable weapon.
effect: Equip the Water Whip Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Water Whips Wielded.
boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Water Whip in each.

name: Grasping Rebuke
desc: Your equipment reaches out to grasp as your foe strikes, tearing their weapon away from them.
trigger: You _Block_ while _Wielding_ a Wooden Weapon or Shield.
effect: Choose: The attacker reduces their Attack Roll by 1, are _Disarmed_ (2 _Grit_), and your Triggering piece of Equipment becomes _Damaged_ OR they reduce their Attack Roll by 4. If the foe is _Disarmed_, the _Disarmed_ item is stuck in your _Damaged_ equipment and cannot be retrieved unless an Action is Sacrificed and 2 _Grit_ is paid while adjacent to you. If your Equipment ceases to be _Damaged_ the item falls in an adjacent unoccupied space.
special: The Attacker may pay 1 _Focus_ to instead choose the Effect.

name: Splinter
desc: You focus on a nearby piece of wood, causing it to explode in a sudden burst.
target: An unequipped _Wood Source_ of Size 1 or smaller within Range.
effect: _Destroy_ the Target and Attack with this Technique's Profile in the Area, centering it on the Target.
special: You may instead Target an Embedded _Wood Source_. The Attack loses the Area tag, but has Advantage and inflicts _Wounded_ 2 (2 _Grit_) on a _Hit_/_Crit_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: You may instead Target a Size 2 _Wood Source_. The Area becomes Burst 2.

name: Splintering Burst
desc: After attacking you detonate the weapon, sending a hail of splintering thorns at nearby foes.
cost: 1 _Momentum_ if Melee or Thrown, 2 _Momentum_ if Ranged
trigger: You make an Attack with a Wooden Weapon.
effect: If you used a Melee or Thrown Weapon, _Damage_ it. Deal 2 Damage (1 _Reflex_ for no damage) in a Burst 1 around the original Target of the Attack.
special: If the Attack _Embed_s, the cost to Negate increases by 1 for the creature the Weapon is Embedded in.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, deal 4 Damage (1 _Reflex_ for half damage).

name: Sprouting Strike
desc: Your weapon suddenly grows, extending its reach for an unexpected strike.
reqs: Wood Melee or Reach Range Weapon Wielded.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. If the Weapon Range is Melee, give it Reach, or if has Reach increase it by 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: The Attack gains _Sure Hit_.

name: Stake
desc: You fire a devastating stake of wood at a foe, attempting to pin them in place.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile. Place the _Wood Source_ adjacent to the Target, unless you _Embed_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Choose a  _Wood Source_ within Range that is not Embedded. Originate the attack from the _Wood Source_ rather than yourself.

name: Swaying Trees
desc: You move a source of wood, either with simple levitation or by temporarily animating it.
target: A _Wood Source_ of up to Size 1 that is unequipped or equipped by a willing creature.
effect: _Slide_ the Target up to 6 spaces. Any creature of your choice the Target moves past gains _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_), and any creature the Target moves through gains _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).
boost:
X _Momentum_: For every Momentum paid you may repeat this Action with a different Target.
	2 _Momentum_: You may instead Target a Size 2 _Wood Source_. Instead of inflicting _Hobbled_, instead inflict _Prone_.

name: Tree Stride
desc: You pull nearby wood around you, creating a thick suit of armor and greatly amplifying your size.
target: Three _Wood Source_s of at least Size 1.
effect: _Destroy_ the Targets. Immediately gain 10 Vigor and 3 _Wood Armor_. While this Enchant is active you are Size 2, add _Reach_ to all Melee Attacks, and reduce the Cost to Negate all _Push_, _Pull_, and _Slide_ Effects by 1. If you have no _Wood Armor_ at Refresh, end this Enchant.
special: While this Enchant is active, you may _Destroy_ additional _Wood Source_s at the start of your Turn by paying 1 _Grit_. When you do, gain 1 _Wood Armor_ and 4 Vigor.

name: Warding Wood
desc: You animate nearby sources of wood, causing them to defend your allies and hinder your foes.
target: Two _Wood Source_s of at least Size 1.
effect: Turn all Targets into Warding Wood while this _Enchant_ persists. All Allies have Cover while adjacent to Warding Wood. Creatures of your choice treat spaces adjacent to Warding Wood as _Rough_ and, if they start their turn adjacent to it, gain _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).
special: While adjacent to any Warding Wood you may spend _Focus_ as _Grit_ for all _Block_ Reactions.
boost: X _Momentum_: For every Momentum spent, increase the Targets by 1.

name: Willow Strike
desc: You bend your bow a bit further or launch your spear a bit harder, providing additional power and range.
reqs: Wood Ranged or Thrown Weapon Wielded.
effect: Increase the Weapon's Range by 3 and add _Pierce_ 1. Attack using your Weapon's Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Embed_ (_Reflex_ 2).

name: Wood Hammer
desc: You seize control of a nearby source of wood, causing it to bend and sway in a deadly arc.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile, originating it from the Target and with a Range equal to the Target's _Wood Source_ Value.
boost: X _Momentum_: You may target a _Wood Source_ of Size X+1, adding X to the Damage and Cost to Negate of the Attack.

name: Wood Ward
desc: Wooden weapons can find no purchase on you. They curve away in an unnatural way, ensuring that they never find purchase.
trigger: You are Attacked with Wood.
effect:
If you paid _Grit_ for the Cost: Add the _Block_ Keyword to this Reaction reduce the Attack Roll by 3.
If you paid _Reflex_ for the cost: Add the _Evade_ Keyword to this Action and reroll the Attack with Disadvantage, using the lower of the two Attack Rolls.
boost: 1 _Grit_ OR 1 _Reflex_ (whichever was not paid in the Cost): Use both Effects.

name: Woodwright
desc: You seize a nearby source of wood, shaping it to create arms and armaments.
target: A _Wood Source_ that is unequipped or equipped by a willing creature.
effect: Destroy the Target. Create any standard Weapon made of Wood, then Move it up to 4 spaces. If you place it next to a creature with an Open Hand, they may immediately Equip it.
special: Instead, remove _Damaged_ from the Target and grant the creature _Wielding_ it 1 _Momentum_.
imbue: 0 _Momentum_: If you create a Weapon, you may instead use this Action as if its speed was Set-Up. It must be Attached to a Strike with the Weapon Keyword. Resolve the Strike using the created Weapon from its final position. It then falls to the ground.

name: Amplify Pulse
desc: You send a powerful pulse through the earth, learning all.
effect: Gain a _Seismic Sense_ Range of 4, or increase it's Range by 2 if you already have one. You may then either gain 1 _Focus_ or inflict 2 _Knowledge_, distributed as you wish between any creatures within your _Seismic Sense_. The cost to Negate is equal to the _Knowledge_ inflicted.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Focus_/_Grit_: Inflict an additional 2 _Knowledge_, distributed as you wish.
* 1 _Focus_: If you do not _Move_ until the end of the next _Phase_, repeat this _Technique_.
imbue: 2 _Focus_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Earthen Eyes
desc: You focus your senses entirely through the earth, ignoring all auxillary inputs.
effect: You are _Blinded_ until the end of the _Round_. While _Blinded_, you may not have _Disadvantage_ on Attacks against creatures within your _Seismic Sense_.
imbue: 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.
reaction_condition: While _Blinded_ by this _Technique_, gain the following _Reaction_:

name: Rippling View
desc: You focus your tremorsense outward, gaining insight into a distant area.
effect: Inflict _Knowledge_ 1, _Scout_ (1 _Focus_) on all creatures of your choice within the Area. In addition, the Area is treated as within you _Seismic Sense_ as long as this Enchant exists. At _Refresh_, inflict _Knowledge_ 1, _Scout_ (1 _Focus_) on all creatures of your choice within the Area. If this _Enchant_ ends, remove the Area.
special: You and your allies may treat _Obstacles_ in the Area as _Fragile_ if you wish.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Focus_: Remove the Enchant Keyword. The Area persists until the end of the Encounter.
* 2 _Focus_: Instead, Area is a _Blast_ 2.
reaction_condition: While an Area persists, you gain the below Reaction:

name: Staggered Footing
desc: You analyze a foe's footing before subtly dashing the earth, exposing the weaknesses in their stance.
effect: Inflict _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_). If the _Target_ is within your _Seismic Sense_, you may instead inflict _Prone_ (2 _Reflex_).
boost:
When you use this Technique you may remove any amount of _Knowledge_ on the Target and gain half the _Tokens_ you would normally gain for clearing this _Knowledge_. You may then purchase additional effects based on the total _Value_ of _Knowledge_ removed. Effects may be purchased multiple times:
* 1: Add _Vulnerable_ 2/_Slowed_.
* 1: Inflict 1 _True_ Damage.
* 2: Add _Staggered_/_Exposed_ 2/_Hobbled_ 1.
* 2: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Tissue Scan
desc: You focus your senses on a foe, learning their weaknesses and how to exploit them.
effect: Inflict _Knowledge_ 2, _Scout_ (2 _Focus_) on the Target. If they do not _Negate_, also learn their _Stance_/_Style_ (your choice) and all Effects that it grants.
special: If the Target is within your _Seismic Sense_, inflict an additional 2 _Value_ of _Knowledge_, either as new Tokens or by increasing the Value of another Token inflicted by this Technique. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
imbue: +1 AP: Repeat the _Effect_, and the _Special_ if applicable. If they do not _Negate_, until of the _Round_. whenever you or an ally would make an Attack against that creature while it is within your _Seismic Sense_ you may choose to remove their topmost _Knowledge_ Token then inflict _Vulnerable_ X, _Dazed_ X-1 (X _Focus_), where X is the Value of the _Knowledge_ Token as you reveal their weaknesses. Both of these Tokens are applied before the Attack is resolved.

name: Creeping Frost
desc: You use the little water in the air to freeze the ground, creating a thin sheet of ice that makes maneuvering difficult.
effect: The Target spaces become _Icy_. Any creatures in these spaces gain _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).
special: When choosing Targets, _Wet_ spaces only count as half of a space.
boost:
X _Momentum_. Increase the number of Target spaces by X.
	1 _Momentum_: You may replace as many _Icy_ spaces with _Icicle_ spaces as you wish.

name: Flash Freeze
desc: You attempt to freeze a creature solid, hardening the water and ice already around them.
effect:
Choose either _Frost_/_Soaked_.
If you choose _Frost_ and the creature has at least 1 _Frost_ Token, they gain 1 _Frost_ or increase one of their _Frost_ Token value by 1, to a maximum of 3. (1 _Reflex_).
If you choose _Frost_ and the creature has at least 3 _Frost_, they gain _Frost_ 2 or increase two of their _Frost_ Token values by 1, to a maximum of 3. (2 _Reflex_).
If you choose _Frost_ and the creature has at least 5 _Frost_, they are immediately _Restrained_ (3 _Grit_).
If you choose _Soaked_ you may convert any number of that creature's _Soaked_ Tokens to _Frost_ Tokens of the same value (2 _Reflex_).
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Resolve the _Soaked_ version of the Effect, then the _Frost_ version of the Effect.

name: Frost Lance
desc: A hardened lance of impossibly hard ice forms in your hand, creating a deadly tool.
effect: Equip the Frost Lance Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Frost Lance Wielded.
boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Frost Lance in each.

name: Frozen Wall
desc: You shape the existing water into rigid structures of ice, .
effect: Destroy the Targets. Create a number of contiguous _Ice Wall_s within Range depending on the Destroyed Targets. For every two _Wet_/_Icy_ spaces you may create a single _Ice Wall_ and for every _Water Source_ you may create one _Ice Wall_.
special: If you create an _Ice Wall_ in a space where you Destroyed a Target, creatures adjacent to that space gain _Frost_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).
boost: X _Momentum_. Increase the number of Targets by X.

name: Glacial Guard
desc: You freeze your body, limiting your movement but enhancing your defense.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_, 1 _Ice Armor_, and your choice of _Frost_ 1 or _2_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. You are _Stuck_ until the end of the Round. While you are _Stuck_, you may spend _Frost_ as _Grit_.

name: Ice Knife
desc: You harden water into jagged blades before sending them flying towards a foe.
effect: Attack with this Technique's Profile.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Halve the Damage, but you may repeat this Strike immediately after using it.

name: Ice Spike
desc: You take advantage of a foe's footing on the ice, creating a dangerous hazard.
trigger: A foe moves into an _Icy_ space, moves adjacent to an _Ice Wall_, or falls _Prone_ in an _Icy_ space.
effect: Choose an _Icy_/_Ice Wall_ space adjacent to the creature within Range. If it is _Icy_, _Destroy_ it and replace it with _Icicle_ Terrain. If it was an _Ice Wall_, create a _Icicle_ space in an adjacent square. Attack with this Technique's Profile against the triggering Target.
special: If this is triggered off of a target falling _Prone_ on _Icy_ Terrain you may choose the space they are currently in. Resolve the Effect as normal, but you have Advantage on the Attack, and the creature immediately suffers the penalty of the _Icicle_ Terrain as if they had moved into it.

name: Ice Storm
desc: A whirling storm of ice and cold forms on the battlefield, threatening all in its path.
effect: Destroy the _Water Source_s. Attack with this Technique's Profile. After the Attack, the Area becomes _Icy_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. This Attack now requires 5 _Water Source_s in Range, but is a Blast 2.

name: Icy Burst
desc: You harden the ice on a creature in a frozen burst, striking with jagged shards.
effect: Deal damage to the Target equal to twice their topmost _Frost_ Token. If the Target is a Waterbound, they may pay 2 _Reflex_ or 2 _Focus_ to negate this attack.
special: After resolving the attack, you may replace any amount of the target's _Frost_ Tokens with _Bleed_ Tokens of the same value.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Add a Burst 1 Area to the attack centered on the Target. Deal damage equal to that creature's topmost _Frost_ Token in the Area and inflict _Frost_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).

name: Icy Grasp
desc: You freeze a target's feet to the ground, rooting them in place.
target: A creature completely on _Icy_/_Wet_ Terrain that is not _Flying_.
effect: The Target becomes _Stuck_ (2 _Reflex_). They may end this _Stuck_ by Sacrificing an Action and spending 1 _Grit_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. If the Target is _Prone_ they are instead _Restrained_ (3 _Reflex_).  They may end this _Restrained_ by Sacrificing an Action and spending 3 _Grit_.

name: Phase Change
desc: You rapidly change the form of water, either hardening it to ice or returning it to a liquid form.
effect: You may change Target _Icy_ and _Ice Wall_ spaces to _Wet_/_Icicle_, Target _Wet_ spaces to _Icy_/_Icicle_, and Target _Water Source_s to _Icy_/_Icicle_. You may not target a _Water Source_ with a creature within.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Target is instead a _Water Source_ with a creature within. That creature is immediately _Entombed_ (3 _Reflex_) in an _Ice Wall_ that replaces the _Water Source_. A creature may end _Entomb_ by spending 3 _Grit_ on their turn.

name: Skate
desc: You propel yourself forward, using a thin sheet of ice beneath your feet to propel yourself forward.
effect: Create two _Icy_ spaces in squares you move through this turn. You may forgo creating two _Icy_ spaces to instead Destroy an _Icy_ space you move through and create an _Ice Wall_ there. You may immediately change direction after creating this _Ice Wall_, even if you are still on _Icy_ Terrain.
special: _Wet_ and _Water Source_ spaces of your choice you move through become _Icy_.
boost:
X _Momentum. You may create an additional X _Icy_ spaces.
	2 _Momentum_: Instead, _Wet_ and _Water Source_ spaces of your choice you move through or adjacent to become _Icy_.

name: Rally
desc: You let out a rallying cry, calling your allies to you.
effect: All allies in the Area may immediately take a Step Movement towards you by the the shortest possible route.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: All allies gain 4 _Vigor_.

name: Bash Aside
desc: You focus an attack on a foe's defenses, doing little damage but knocking them off-balance.
effect:
You may purchase a number of the following effects equal to the _Speed_ of your Weapon and inflict them on a creature within Range. You may purchase the same effect multiple times:
	• 1: Inflict _Exposed_ 1, _Push_ 1 or _Vulnerable_ 2.
	• 2: Inflict _Slowed_, _Exposed_ 2 _Vulnerable_ 3, or _Dazed_ 1.
	• 3: Inflict _Exposed_ 3 or _Dazed_ 2.
	• 4: Inflict _Dazed_ 3.
The total Cost to Negate is _Grit_/_Focus_ equal to (_Speed_ / 2) + 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead of _Push_, inflict _Throw_ of the same value.

name: Helm Splitter
desc: A mighty overhand blow that thwarts armor and attempts to block.
effect: Attack the creature's Armor using your weapon's Profile.
special: If you _Damage_ a _Shield_ or inflicted _Shred_ would instead inflict _Vulnerable_, add _Dazed_ 2 to the attack against the creature.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Increase your Damage by 2 for the Attack against the _Armor_ only. This _Boost_ is Repeatable.
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: If you would _Shred_, instead _Shred_x2.

name: Slamming Strike
desc: Your weapon makes heavy contact, slamming a foe into the ground with driving force.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Add _Prone_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, or 2 if the _Attack_ would already inflict _Prone_. If the Target is knocked _Prone_, make a _Glancing_ Attack using the same Weapon in a _Burst_ 1 centered on the Target.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: If the Target is knocked _Prone_, make the target's space and the _Burst_ _Veiled_.
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, make a _Glancing_ attack in a _Blast_ 1 centered on the Target.
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_ from the _Burst_/_Blast_.

name: Smash
desc: You slam your weapon down, building your strength and destroying the terrain around you.
effect:
Choose one:
* Attack an _Obstacle_ within Range. If you _Destroy_ it, gain 3 _Grit_, and you may make the space _Rough_ or _Veiled_. Otherwise, gain 1 _Grit_.
* Choose a space within Range. Make it _Rough_ or _Jagged_, then gain 2 _Grit_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Inflict 2 Damage and _Vulnerable_ 2 (1 _Reflex_) on a creature adjacent to the _Obstacle_ or _Terrain_.
* 1 _Grit_: Add _Siege_.

name: Shattering Counter
desc: You meet a foes' blade in a dangerous counter, putting both weapons are risk.
trigger: You are Attacked with a Weapon.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, targeting the Weapon used for the Attack. If the Target's weapon is _Damaged_ by this, reduce their initial Attack Roll against you by 2. If you _Miss_,  also resolve the Target's Attack against your Weapon. Otherwise, reduce the Attack Roll by 1.

name: Sunder
desc: You lash out at a foe's weapon, attempting to render it useless.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, targeting a Wielded Weapon.

name: Weapon Lock
desc: You lock your blade with an enemy, forcing them to give you their full attention.
effect: Unless the Target pays any 2 of _Reflex_/_Focus_ you enter a Blade Lock with them. Choose one of the creature's Wielded Weapons to enter a Blade Lock with, as well as a Blade Weapon you have Wielded. The first creature to either use the Weapon involved in the Blade Lock or willingly Move out of Melee Range loses the Blade Lock. The victor may immediately make a Weapon Strike against them at Advantage as a Reaction. On a _Hit_+,  inflict _Impaired_ 2 (2 _Grit_).
special: If the creature is unwillingly moved, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to make a Weapon Strike as a Reaction, although you do not have Advantage and do not inflict _Impaired_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: If you are using a Two-Handed Blade, increase the initial cost to Negate by 1.

name: Agile Feint
desc: You use your extreme speed to find an opening and exploit it.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Single Target Strike.
effect: The Target of the Attached Strike must _Negate_ with 2 _Reflex_, otherwise you gain _Advantage_ on the Attached Strike.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Move is instead Dash. If you are able to move to the opposite side of the enemy from where you started your turn add _Sure Hit_ 1 and deal an additional 4 Damage.

name: Agile Pursuit
desc: You use your superior speed to keep pace with a foe before striking them.
cost: 2 _Reflex_, 1 _Momentum_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 3 or slower.
trigger: An enemy within your Reach moves outside your Reach.
effect: At the end of that creature's turn, immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_. Increase the Movement of the Technique by one step, but you must use any _Movement_ granted by the chosen _Technique_ to move towards the enemy, ending this Reaction as close to them as possible. If you are adjacent to the target, make the Attack with _Advantage_.
special: Gain the Pursuit Technique.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.

name: Alight
desc: You channel more and more energy into speed, enhancing your reflexes and accelerating your movement.
effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_ and either 1 _Momentum_/_Accelerate_. You may choose what Technique to _Accelerate_ rather than the next to occur.
special: If you are in a Zephyr Stance gain 1 additional _Reflex_/_Momentum_.
imbue: 2 _Reflex_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Float Away
desc: You take to the skies as a foe attacks you, throwing off their attack.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Force the attacker to reroll the Attack. If the Attack was Melee, they reroll it at _Disadvantage_. They must use the new result. You are _Flying_ until the end of the current Phase.
special: If you are already _Flying_, reduce the _Cost_ of this Reaction by 1.

name: Flyby
desc: You make use of a quick flight to launch yourself forward, easily gaining ground and retreating.
effect: Attach this to any Technique, then resolve it as both Set-Up and Follow-Up.
special: If you are already _Flying_, reduce the _Cost_ by 1.

name: Godspeed
desc: You move with incredible speed, all but forcing a foe's attack to miss.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Force the attacker to reroll the Attack using only a d6. They must use the new result.

name: Nimble Strikes
desc: A blisteringly-fast strike that happens in a blink of the eye.
effect: Make two _Glancing_ attacks using your weapon's Profile. _Versatile_ Weapons take a -2 damage penalty.
special: If the Speed of this Technique would be less than 1, it becomes Speed 1 and gains _Priority_. The cost to _Negate_ is then increased by 1.

name: Remove Tether
desc: You become light enough that the ground is no longer a limitation for you, allowing you to take to the sky.
cost: Any 4 _Reflex_/_Momentum_ initially, 2 _Reflex_ at each subsequent Refresh.
effect: You become _Flying_ as long as this _Enchant_ persists.

name: Turbo
desc: A horrifically fast dash that moves you across the battlefield near-instantly.
move:
The movement granted by Turbo determines its Speed, as follows: 
* <ins>Dash:</ins> Speed 1 
*  <ins>Sprint:</ins> Speed 2
effect: None.
boost:
1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: You may _Leap_ your Reposition distance during this Movement. You may use this Boost multiple times.
	Any 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: This Move is _Flying_.

name: Uncanny Dodge
desc: You slip past a hazard, putting yourself in an advantageous position while you do so.
trigger: You can _Negate_ with _Reflex_ or trigger a _Hazard_.
effect: Reduce the cost to _Negate_ the triggering Effect by 1. If it was a _Hazard_, instead reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 2 and you may _Negate_ with _Reflex_ instead of the original Token. If you _Negate_ the effect, immediately take a Step Movement.

name: Uncanny Speed
desc: You channel the wind to give you uncanny speed, allowing you to dash forward without a care.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: None.
boost:
1 _Reflex_: This _Movement_ is _Safe_.
2 _Reflex_: The Trigger is instead 'A _Turn_ begins'.

name: Windsweep
desc: You attack at lightning speed, making it near-impossible to dodge or counter.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Add _Impair_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) to a _Hit_ and _Impair_ 2 (2 _Reflex_) to a _Crit_.
